                    获取文章状态  ¶

                    获取文章状态
                    GET/posts/status

                    请求参数

                    • post_guids - 必填 文章GUID,存在多个时用英文逗号连接

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/posts/status
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "post_guids": "63,66"
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "guid": "63",
      "post_status": "pending"
    },
    {
      "guid": "66",
      "post_status": "published"
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}
                    Response  406
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "no_ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": [
    {
      "field": "post no found",
      "message": "文章不存在"
    }
  ]
}

                    获取文章搜索热词  ¶

                    获取文章搜索热词
                    GET/posts/hot_words

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/posts/hot_words
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "guid": "3072834",
    "hot_word": "区块链也有漏洞么",
    "time_created": null,
    "status": "open"
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    实体 ¶

                    Entity分享  ¶

                    • 支持所有的entity类型（主键名为GUID）的分享

                    Entity分享
                    POST/entities/{entity_guid}/shares

                    请求参数

                    • social_media - 必填
                      • sina_weibo
                      • tencent_weibo
                      • qq
                      • evernote
                      • wechat
                      • wechat_friend_circle
                      • email

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/entities/23020/shares
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    entity_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    Entity表GUID

                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "social_media": "sina_weibo"
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result": "ok"
    "data":{}
    "cursor":{}
    "success": "",
    "errors": []
}

                    Entity点赞  ¶

                    • 该接口用于记录用户点赞或喜欢(或感兴趣)entity（主键名为GUID）的行为

                    • 支持’post’（文章）, ‘vc_knowledge’（潜在众筹知识库）, ‘stories’（小说章节）,‘case_teardown_report’ (案例拆解报告), ‘product_show’ (我造产品),‘word’ （瞬眼天下）,‘auction_talk’ (竞拍讨论)类型的点赞喜欢

                    点赞
                    POST/entities/{entity_guid}/upvotes

                    请求参数

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/entities/23020/upvotes
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    entity_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    Entity表GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result": "ok"
    "data":{}
    "cursor":{}
    "success": "",
    "errors": []
}

                    取消赞
                    DELETE/entities/{entity_guid}/upvotes

                    请求参数

                    Example URI

                    DELETE http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/entities/23020/upvotes
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    entity_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    Entity表GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result": "ok"
    "data":{}
    "cursor":{}
    "success": "",
    "errors": []
}

                    踩Entity  ¶

                    • 该接口用于记录用户踩entity（主键名为GUID）的行为

                    • 支持’post’（文章）, ‘word’ （瞬眼天下）踩

                    踩
                    POST/entities/{entity_guid}/downvotes

                    请求参数

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/entities/23020/downvotes
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    entity_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    Entity表GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result": "ok"
    "data":{}
    "cursor":{}
    "success": "",
    "errors": []
}

                    取消踩
                    DELETE/entities/{entity_guid}/downvotes

                    请求参数

                    Example URI

                    DELETE http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/entities/23020/downvotes
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    entity_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    Entity表GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result": "ok"
    "data":{}
    "cursor":{}
    "success": "",
    "errors": []
}

                    Entity收藏  ¶

                    • 暂支持’post’（文章）, ‘vc_knowledge’（潜在众筹知识库）, ‘product_show’ （我造产品）这几类Entity（主键名为GUID）的收藏

                    收藏
                    POST/entities/{entity_guid}/bookmarks

                    请求参数

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/entities/23020/bookmarks
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    entity_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    Entity表GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result": "ok"
    "data":{}
    "cursor":{}
    "success": "",
    "errors": []
}

                    取消收藏
                    DELETE/entities/{entity_guid}/bookmarks

                    请求参数

                    Example URI

                    DELETE http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/entities/23020/bookmarks
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    entity_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    Entity表GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result": "ok"
    "data":{}
    "cursor":{}
    "success": "",
    "errors": []
}

                    数字货币 ¶

                    交易所列表  ¶

                    交易所列表
                    GET/digiccy/exchange

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/digiccy/exchange
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    access-token: f72fc914
                    user-unique-key: 1234sk2jlee1101
                    Response  200
                    HideShow

                    • exch_name - String 交易所名称

                    • exch_code - String 交易所代号

                    • exch_url - String 交易所网址

                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "exch_name": "Bitstamp",
      "exch_code": "BITS",
      "exch_url": "https://www.bitstamp.net/"
    },

                    数字货币列表  ¶

                    数字货币列表
                    GET/digiccy/market

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/digiccy/market
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    access-token: f72fc914
                    user-unique-key: 1234sk2jlee1101
                    Response  200
                    HideShow

                    • market - String 货币交易对代号

                    • market_name - String 主货币显示名称

                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "market_name": "BCH",
      "market": "BCH/USD"
    },
    {

      "market": "BTC/USD"

                    某交易所的实时货币交易数据  ¶

                    某交易所的实时货币交易数据
                    GET/digiccy/exchange_mkt{?exch_code}

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/digiccy/exchange_mkt?exch_code=BITS
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    exch_code
                    string (required) Example: BITS

                    交易所代码

                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    access-token: f72fc914
                    user-unique-key: 1234sk2jlee1101
                    Body
                    {
  "exch_code": "LIVE"
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow

                    • exch_name - String 交易所名称

                    • exch_code - String 交易所代号

                    • market - String 货币交易对代号

                    • market_name - String 主货币显示名称

                    • degree - String 涨跌幅，保留小数点后3位

                    • open_price - String 开盘价（早8:00）单位美元

                    • last_price - String 最新价，单位美元

                    • high_price - String 最高价，单位美元

                    • low_price - String 最低价，单位美元

                    • open_price_cny - String 开盘价（早8:00）单位人民币（元）

                    • last_price_cny - String 最新价，单位人民币（元）

                    • high_price_cny - String 最高价，单位人民币（元）

                    • low_price_cny - String 最低价，单位人民币（元）

                    • current_vol - String 当前成交货币量，单位（个）

                    • time_updated - String 数据更新时间戳，秒级，东八区时间

                    • is_current_user_following - boolean 当前登录用户是否自选了该交易平台下的该交易对行情数据

                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "exch_code": "LIVE",
      "market": "ZRX/USD",
      "market_name": "ZRX",
      "degree": "-0.012",
      "open_price": "1.7200000000",
      "last_price": "1.7000000000",
      "high_price": "2.3000000000",
      "low_price": "1.7000000000",
      "open_price_cny": "10.885192",
      "last_price_cny": "10.75862",
      "high_price_cny": "14.55578",
      "low_price_cny": "10.75862",
      "current_vol": "1571.0908000000",
      "is_current_user_following": true,
      "time_updated": 1517367729
    },
    {
      "exch_code": "LIVE",
      "market": "DIBC/USD",
      "market_name": "DIBC",
      "degree": "0.005",
      "open_price": "0.0406200000",
      "last_price": "0.0408100000",
      "high_price": "0.0520000000",
      "low_price": "0.0355300000",
      "open_price_cny": "0.257067732",
      "last_price_cny": "0.258270166",
      "high_price_cny": "0.3290872",
      "low_price_cny": "0.224855158",
      "current_vol": "6435.6994000000",
      "is_current_user_following": true,
      "time_updated": 1517368396
    },
    {
      "exch_code": "LIVE",
      "market": "DGD/USD",
      "market_name": "DGD",
      "degree": "0.000",
      "open_price": "268.0000000000",
      "last_price": "268.0000000000",
      "high_price": "268.0000000000",
      "low_price": "260.0000000000",
      "open_price_cny": "1696.0648",
      "last_price_cny": "1696.0648",
      "high_price_cny": "1696.0648",
      "low_price_cny": "1645.436",
      "current_vol": "0.7029000000",
      "is_current_user_following": true,
      "time_updated": 1517368359
    },
    {
      "exch_code": "LIVE",
      "market": "DASH/USD",
      "market_name": "DASH",
      "degree": "-0.005",
      "open_price": "730.3052300000",
      "last_price": "726.8222500000",

      "exch_code": "LIVE",
      "market": "ADZ/USD",
      "market_name": "ADZ",
      "degree": "0.000",
      "open_price": "0.1187300000",
      "last_price": "0.1187300000",
      "high_price": "0.1190000000",
      "low_price": "0.1001600000",
      "open_price_cny": "0.751394678",
      "last_price_cny": "0.751394678",

                    某货币在不同交易所的实时交易数据  ¶

                    某货币在不同交易所的实时交易数据
                    GET/digiccy/mkt_exchange{?market}{?order}{?sort}

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/digiccy/mkt_exchange?market=DASH/USD?order=degree?sort=asc
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    market
                    string (required) Example: DASH/USD

                    数字货币交易对code

                    order
                    string (required) Example: degree

                    排序条件，默认不传，可选值 degree 涨跌幅

                    sort
                    string (required) Example: asc

                    排序方式，顺序或逆序，默认desc(从大到小)， 可选值 asc, desc

                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    access-token: f72fc914
                    user-unique-key: 1234sk2jlee1101
                    Body
                    {
  "market": "DASH/USD"
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow

                    • exch_name - String 交易所名称

                    • exch_code - String 交易所代号

                    • market - String 货币交易对代号

                    • market_name - String 主货币显示名称

                    • degree - String 涨跌幅，保留小数点后3位

                    • open_price - String 开盘价（早8:00）单位美元

                    • last_price - String 最新价，单位美元

                    • high_price - String 最高价，单位美元

                    • low_price - String 最低价，单位美元

                    • open_price_cny - String 开盘价（早8:00）单位人民币（元）

                    • last_price_cny - String 最新价，单位人民币（元）

                    • high_price_cny - String 最高价，单位人民币（元）

                    • low_price_cny - String 最低价，单位人民币（元）

                    • current_vol - String 当前成交货币量，单位（个）

                    • time_updated - String 数据更新时间戳，秒级，东八区时间

                    • is_current_user_following - boolean 当前登录用户是否自选了该交易平台下的该交易对行情数据

                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "exch_code": "LIVE",
      "market": "DASH/USD",
      "market_name": "DASH",
      "degree": "0.000",
      "open_price": "790.0181900000",
      "last_price": "790.0181900000",
      "high_price": "811.3099800000",
      "low_price": "772.0801000000",
      "open_price_cny": "4999.709117234",
      "last_price_cny": "4999.709117234",
      "high_price_cny": "5134.456339428",
      "low_price_cny": "4886.18612086",
      "current_vol": "237.7740000000",
      "is_current_user_following": true,
      "time_updated": 1517216682
    },
    {
      "exch_code": "HITB",
      "market": "DASH/USD",
      "market_name": "DASH",
      "degree": "0.000",
      "open_price": "763.6300000000",
      "last_price": "763.6300000000",
      "high_price": "828.3100000000",
      "low_price": "756.2300000000",
      "open_price_cny": "4832.708818",
      "last_price_cny": "4832.708818",
      "high_price_cny": "5242.042666",
      "low_price_cny": "4785.877178",
      "current_vol": "5593.8620000000",
      "is_current_user_following": true,
      "time_updated": 1517215333
    },
    {
      "exch_code": "EXMO",
      "market": "DASH/USD",
      "market_name": "DASH",
      "degree": "0.000",
      "open_price": "803.1580000000",
      "last_price": "803.1580000000",
      "high_price": "839.0000000000",
      "low_price": "800.0000000000",
      "open_price_cny": "5082.8657188",
      "last_price_cny": "5082.8657188",

      "low_price_cny": "5062.88",
      "current_vol": "1081.2143000000",
      "is_current_user_following": true,
      "time_updated": 1517216393
    },
    {
      "exch_code": "CXIO",
      "market": "DASH/USD",
      "market_name": "DASH",
      "degree": "0.000",
      "open_price": "793.9200000000",
      "last_price": "793.9200000000",
      "high_price": "840.0800000000",
      "low_price": "785.0000000000",
      "open_price_cny": "5024.402112",
      "last_price_cny": "5024.402112",

                    某货币在某交易所的24小时交易价格  ¶

                    某货币在某交易所的24小时交易价格
                    GET/digiccy/trend{?market}{?exch_code}

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/digiccy/trend?market=BTC/USD?exch_code=BITS
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    market
                    string (required) Example: BTC/USD

                    数字货币交易对code

                    exch_code
                    string (required) Example: BITS

                    交易所代号

                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    access-token: f72fc914
                    user-unique-key: 1234sk2jlee1101
                    Body
                    {
  "market": "BTC/USD",
  "exch_code": "BITS"
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow

                    • timestamp - String 数据更新时间戳，秒级，东八区时间

                    • price - String 当时价，单位美元

                    • price_cny - String 当时价，单位人民币（元）

                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "timestamp": "1517270400",
      "price": "10980.0000000000",
      "price_cny": "69488.028"
    },
    {
      "timestamp": "1517266800",
      "price": "10980.0000000000",
      "price_cny": "69488.028"
    },
    {
      "timestamp": "1517263200",
      "price": "10980.0000000000",
      "price_cny": "69488.028"
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    自选货币交易行情  ¶

                    订阅
                    POST/digiccy/subscribe

                    请求参数

                    • currencies - 自选的货币对和货币对所在市场，请每次传递完整的用户订阅的货币信息， 必需
                    {
        "BTC/USD": //交易对代号 market
            [
                "BITF", //交易市场代号 exch_code
                "HUOBI" //交易市场代号 exch_code
            ],
        "ETC/USD": //交易对代号 market
            [
                "BITH", //交易市场代号 exch_code
                "ZB"    //交易市场代号 exch_code
            ]
    }

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/digiccy/subscribe
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    access-token: f72fc914
                    user-unique-key: 1234sk2jlee1101
                    Body
                    {
    "currencies": {"BTC/USD":["BITF","HUOBI"],"ETC/USD":["BITH","ZB"]},
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "success",
  "errors": []
}

                    取消订阅
                    DELETE/digiccy/subscribe

                    请求参数

                    • currencies - 自选的货币对和货币对所在市场，请每次传递完整的用户订阅的货币信息， 必需
                    {
        "BTC/USD": //交易对代号 market
            [
                "BITF", //交易市场代号 exch_code
                "HUOBI" //交易市场代号 exch_code
            ],
        "ETC/USD": //交易对代号 market
            [
                "BITH", //交易市场代号 exch_code
                "ZB"    //交易市场代号 exch_code
            ]
    }

                    Example URI

                    DELETE http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/digiccy/subscribe
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    access-token: f72fc914
                    user-unique-key: 1234sk2jlee1101
                    Body
                    {
    "currencies": {"BTC/USD":["BITF","HUOBI"],"ETC/USD":["BITH","ZB"]},
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "success",
  "errors": []
}

                    订阅的自选交易行情
                    GET/digiccy/subscribe

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/digiccy/subscribe
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    access-token: f72fc914
                    user-unique-key: 1234sk2jlee1101
                    Body
                    {}
                    Response  406
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "no_ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": [
    {
      "field": "no subscibe",
      "message": "no subscibe"
    }
  ]
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow

                    • exch_name - String 交易所名称

                    • exch_code - String 交易所代号

                    • market - String 货币交易对代号

                    • market_name - String 主货币显示名称

                    • degree - String 涨跌幅，保留小数点后3位

                    • open_price - String 开盘价（早8:00）单位美元

                    • last_price - String 最新价，单位美元

                    • high_price - String 最高价，单位美元

                    • low_price - String 最低价，单位美元

                    • open_price_cny - String 开盘价（早8:00）单位人民币（元）

                    • last_price_cny - String 最新价，单位人民币（元）

                    • high_price_cny - String 最高价，单位人民币（元）

                    • low_price_cny - String 最低价，单位人民币（元）

                    • current_vol - String 当前成交货币量，单位（个）

                    • time_updated - String 数据更新时间戳，秒级，东八区时间

                    • is_current_user_following - boolean 当前登录用户是否自选了该交易平台下的该交易对行情数据

                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "exch_name": "Bitstamp",
      "exch_code": "BITS",
      "market": "ETH/USD",
      "market_name": "ETH",
      "degree": "-1.68",
      "open_price": "814.00",
      "last_price": "800.33",
      "high_price": "808.00",
      "low_price": "591.00",
      "open_price_cny": "5124.86",
      "last_price_cny": "5038.80",
      "high_price_cny": "5087.09",
      "low_price_cny": "3720.88",
      "current_vol": "116800.63",
      "is_current_user_following": true,
      "time_updated": 1517995450
    },
    {
      "exch_name": "Bitfinex",
      "exch_code": "BITF",
      "market": "ETH/USD",
      "market_name": "ETH",
      "degree": "0.00",
      "open_price": "864.96",
      "last_price": "864.96",
      "high_price": "878.48",
      "low_price": "598.98",
      "open_price_cny": "5445.70",
      "last_price_cny": "5445.70",
      "high_price_cny": "5530.82",
      "low_price_cny": "3771.12",
      "current_vol": "660868.54",
      "is_current_user_following": true,
      "time_updated": 1519701246
    },
    {
      "exch_name": "Bitfinex",
      "exch_code": "BITF",
      "market": "BTC/USD",
      "market_name": "BTC",
      "degree": "31.35",
      "open_price": "7833.93",
      "last_price": "10290.00",
      "high_price": "10310.00",
      "low_price": "6282.00",
      "open_price_cny": "49321.66",
      "last_price_cny": "64784.81",
      "high_price_cny": "64910.73",
      "low_price_cny": "39550.84",
      "current_vol": "169543.73",
      "is_current_user_following": true,
      "time_updated": 1519714033
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    置顶自选货币  ¶

                    置顶自选货币
                    POST/digiccy/subscribe/top

                    请求参数

                    • currencies - 自选的货币对和货币对所在市场，支持多传，但目前产品仅允许置顶单个， 必需
                    {
        "BTC/USD": //交易对代号 market
            [
                "BITF", //交易市场代号 exch_code
                "HUOBI" //交易市场代号 exch_code
            ],
        "ETC/USD": //交易对代号 market
            [
                "BITH", //交易市场代号 exch_code
                "ZB"    //交易市场代号 exch_code
            ]
    }

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/digiccy/subscribe/top
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    access-token: f72fc914
                    user-unique-key: 1234sk2jlee1101
                    Body
                    {
    "currencies": {"BTC/USD":["BITF"]},
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "success",
  "errors": []
}

                    栏目 ¶

                    获取栏目列表  ¶

                    获取栏目列表
                    GET/categories/list

                    请求参数

                    • orderby - string 选填

                      • weight - 栏目权重 默认
                      • time_created - 栏目创建时间
                      • time_updated - 栏目修改时间

                    • sort - 选填

                      • desc - 默认
                      • asc

                    • limit - 选填

                    • offset - 选填

                    • logo_image_size - 选填，设置请求的背景大图图片尺寸

                    返回数据

                    • logo - object 背景大图

                    • main - string 栏目摘要

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/categories/list
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "guid": "1021818",
      "title": "汉s",
      "main": "湖南",
      "time_created": "1458632121",
      "slug": "mmmm",
      "comment_num": "0",
      "logo": {
        "original": [
          {
            "url": "http://btm.dev/uploads/images/2015/09/e53fa4df2ad68550ab117d16ac8158dd14430797804151.png",
            "description": null,
            "alt": null,
            "size": "original",
            "width": 1200,
            "height": 600
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    {
      "guid": "1021862",
      "title": "科技频道",
      "main": "这是科技频道的简介",
      "time_created": "1468833198",
      "slug": "t-show",
      "comment_num": "0",
      "logo": {
        "original": [
          {
            "url": "http://btm.dev/uploads/images/2015/09/e53fa4df2ad68550ab117d16ac8158dd14430797804151.png",
            "description": null,
            "alt": null,
            "size": "original",
            "width": 1200,
            "height": 600
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "total": 2,
    "limit": 10,
    "offset": 0
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    获取栏目详情  ¶

                    获取栏目详情
                    GET/categories/{category_guid}/detail

                    请求参数

                    • logo_image_size - 选填，设置请求的背景大图图片尺寸

                    返回参数

                    • logo - object 背景大图

                    • main - string 栏目摘要

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/categories/100030/detail
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    category_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 100030

                    栏目GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "guid": "1021818",
    "title": "汉s",
    "main": "湖南",
    "time_created": "1458632121",
    "slug": "mmmm",
    "comment_num": "0",
    "logo": {
      "original": [
        {
          "url": "http://btm.dev/uploads/images/2015/09/e53fa4df2ad68550ab117d16ac8158dd14430797804151.png",
          "description": null,
          "alt": null,
          "size": "original",
          "width": 1200,
          "height": 600
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    栏目的话题列表  ¶

                    栏目的话题列表
                    GET/categories/category_tags/{category_guid}

                    说明

                    默认话题排序权重排列

                    请求参数

                    • fields - string 自定义话题输出参数，参考参考这里部分

                    • limit - interger 可选 default 10

                    • offset - interger 可选 default 0

                    返回数据

                    参数 类型 描述

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/categories/category_tags/100320
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    category_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 100320

                    栏目GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "guid": "298898",
      "tag": "1号店",
      "time_updated": "1418085539",
      "number_of_followers": "40",
      "tag_image": null,
      "is_special_column": true,
      "categories": [
        "company"
      ],
      "is_current_user_following": true
    },
    {
      "guid": "298909",
      "tag": "9158",
      "time_updated": "1407368277",
      "number_of_followers": "14",
      "tag_image": "http://images.tmtpost.com/uploads/filetemp/20150807/2758910.png?imageMogr2/format/jpg/thumbnail/200x200/gravity/center/crop/!200x100&ext=.png",
      "is_special_column": false,
      "categories": [
        "company"
      ],
      "is_current_user_following": false
    },
    {
      "guid": "298917",
      "tag": "B2B",
      "time_updated": "1430269212",
      "number_of_followers": "31",
      "tag_image": null,
      "is_special_column": false,
      "categories": [],
      "is_current_user_following": false
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "limit": 10,
    "offset": 0,
    "total": 998
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    竞拍 ¶

                    竞拍属性

                    默认输出：

                    • auction_guid - Integer 竞拍GUID

                    • title - String 竞拍标题

                    • time_created - Integer 竞拍创建时间

                    • time_updated - Integer 竞拍修改时间

                    设置输出：

                    • status - string 竞拍状态, 可能存在的值 ‘pre-publish’ (预热中), ‘published’ （已发布）,‘closed’ (已关闭)， 默认值 null (未知状态)

                    • hero_image - String 竞拍封面图片

                    • summary - Integer 竞拍摘要

                    • number_of_posts - Integer 竞拍下的文章数

                    • number_of_talks - Integer 竞拍下讨论的数量

                    • award - String 竞拍奖励

                    • time_started- Integer 竞拍开始时间

                    • time_ended - Integer 竞拍结束时间

                    • share_link - String 竞拍分享链接

                    • link_title - String 链接title

                    • link_url - String 链接url

                    内容页  ¶

                    获取内容页
                    GET/auctions/{auction_guid}

                    请求参数

                    • fields - 选填

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/auctions/23020
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    auction_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    竞拍GUID

                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "fields": "hero_image;summary;award;status;time_started;time_ended",
  "hero_image_size": [
    "400_300"
  ]
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result": "ok",
    "data":{
        "auction_guid":1231,
        "hero_image":{
            "400_300":[
                {
                     "url":"http://www.geekpark.net/images/1232.jpg",
                      "description":"这是一个图片的描述",
                      "size":"400_300",
                      "width":400,
                      "height":300
                  }
            ]
        },
        "title":"高通反垄断10亿美元结案，对行业影响多大？",
        "time_created":323434343,
        "time_updated":324242424,
        "time_published":12323232,
        "summmary":"这是一段描述",
        "time_started":423353434,
        "share_link":" http://www.tmtpost.com/award/2533905.html",
        "time_ended":454534343,
        "award":"一等奖: 500元（1名），二等奖: 200元（两名）",
    },
    "cursor":{},
    "success": "",
    "errors": []
}

                    列表  ¶

                    获取列表
                    GET/auctions/list

                    请求参数

                    • fields - 选填

                    • offset - 选填

                    • limit - 选填

                    • status - 选填，指定竞拍的状态， 可选值 pre-publish (预热中), published （正在进行中）, closed （已关闭）

                    • orderby - 选填

                      • time_begin - 竞拍开始时间
                      • time_ended - 竞拍结束时间 默认
                      • time_updated - 竞拍修改时间
                      • time_created - 竞拍创建时间

                    • sort - 选填

                      • desc - 默认
                      • asc

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/auctions/list
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "auction_guid": 121,
      "title": "高通反垄断10亿美元结案，对行业影响多大？",
      "time_created": 323434343,
      "time_updated": 324242424,
      "status": "closed",
      "time_published": 12323232
    },
    {
      "auction_guid": 122,
      "title": "高通反垄断10亿美元结案，对行业影响多大？",
      "time_created": 323434343,
      "time_updated": 324242424,
      "status": "published",
      "time_published": 12323232
    },
    {
      "auction_guid": 122,
      "title": "高通反垄断10亿美元结案，对行业影响多大？",
      "time_created": 323434343,
      "time_updated": 324242424,
      "status": "closed",
      "time_published": 12323232
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "total": 15,
    "offset": 0,
    "limit": 10
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    讨论列表  ¶

                    获取讨论列表
                    GET/auctions/talk/list

                    请求参数

                    • auction_guid - 竞拍guid

                    • if_starred_only - 传值 1为加精，2为普通，其他或不传为混合

                    • offset - 选填

                    • limit - 选填

                    • orderby - String 选填

                      • mixed - 默认排序：加精在前，其它在后
                      • time_created - 创建时间
                      • votes - 被赞数

                    • sort - 选填

                      • desc - 默认
                      • asc

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/auctions/talk/list
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "auction_guid": "6930",
      "talk_guid": "2560168",
      "talk": "不想看的可以不看，玄机少了你们也不会倒闭[打脸]ky有意思吗",
      "time_created": "1489727212",
      "status": "published",
      "like_num": "0",
      "comment_num": "1",
      "is_comment_stared": true,
      "if_current_user_upvoted": false,
      "user": {
        "guid": "2533469",
        "username": "1223",
        "is_current_user_following": false,
        "signature": "博士",
        "avatar": "http://7xil86.com2.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/uploads/avatar/2a7991a7fc6e02828f17a6b43cb574ef_1488352920.jpeg",
        "type_of_verification": "inside",
        "type": "register"
      }
    },
    {
      "auction_guid": "6930",
      "talk_guid": "2560171",
      "talk": "靠品质和个性，如何唤醒新一代",
      "time_created": "1490581321",
      "status": "published",
      "like_num": "0",
      "comment_num": "0",
      "is_comment_stared": false,
      "if_current_user_upvoted": false,
      "user": {
        "guid": "0",
        "username": "匿名用户",
        "avatar": null,
        "is_current_user_following": null,
        "signature": null,
        "type_of_verification": null,
        "type": "anonymous"
      }
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "total": 15,
    "limit": "2",
    "offset": 0
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    讨论内容页  ¶

                    获取讨论内容页
                    GET/auctions/talk/{talk_guid}

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/auctions/talk/2560097
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    talk_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 2560097

                    讨论GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "talk_guid": "2560168",
    "talk": "不想看的可以不看，玄机少了你们也不会倒闭[打脸]ky有意思吗",
    "time_created": "1489727212",
    "status": "published",
    "like_num": "0",
    "comment_num": "1",
    "is_comment_stared": true,
    "if_current_user_upvoted": false,
    "user": {
      "guid": "2533469",
      "username": "1223",
      "is_current_user_following": false,
      "signature": "博士",
      "avatar": "http://7xil86.com2.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/uploads/avatar/2a7991a7fc6e02828f17a6b43cb574ef_1488352920.jpeg",
      "type_of_verification": "inside",
      "type": "register"
    }
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "ok",
  "errors": []
}

                    发表讨论和删除讨论  ¶

                    发表讨论
                    POST/auctions/talk

                    请求参数

                    • auction_guid - 必填 竞拍guid

                    • talk - 必填 讨论内容

                    • commentator - string 选填 讨论人的名字 //登录用户是用户名，游客是自己选的名字或系统生成。

                    • captcha_id - 选填 验证码ID

                    • captcha_word - 选填 验证码

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/auctions/talk
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": "ok",
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    删除讨论
                    DELETE/auctions/talk

                    请求参数

                    • talk_guid - 必填 讨论guid

                    Example URI

                    DELETE http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/auctions/talk
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": "ok",
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    讨论加精和取消加精  ¶

                    加精
                    POST/auctions/talk/{talk_guid}/stars

                    请求参数

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/auctions/talk/2560097/stars
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    talk_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 2560097

                    讨论GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": "ok",
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    取消加精
                    DELETE/auctions/talk/{talk_guid}/stars

                    请求参数

                    Example URI

                    DELETE http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/auctions/talk/2560097/stars
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    talk_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 2560097

                    讨论GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": "ok",
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    评论 ¶

                    评论列表  ¶

                    获取评论列表
                    GET/comments/list/{entity_guid}

                    请求参数

                    • device_type - String - 选填 获取指定平台下的评论列表

                      • all - 默认为“all”，输出全部设备的评论
                      • "ios;android;pc;h5" - string 用户也可以在字符串中指定一台或多台设备

                    • orderby - String 选填

                      • mixed - 默认排序：加精在前，其它在后（按“votes”排序两个列表）
                      • time_created - 创建时间
                      • votes - 被赞数

                    • if_starred_only - Boolean 选填，默认为 false

                    • limit - Integer 选填

                    • offset - Integer 选填

                    返回参数

                    • attitude - String 该评论的态度，存在三种值：NULL(无态度)，‘upvote’(认同) ‘downvote’(不认同)

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/comments/list/23020
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    entity_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    Entity表GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result":"ok",
    "data":[
        {
            "comment_id":12,
            "device_type":"pc",
            "time_created":23189343432,
            "comment_father_id":0,
            "father_commentator_id":17,
            "father_commentator_username":"我是你爸爸",
            "comment":"这是一条评论",
            "is_comment_stared":true,
            "number_of_upvotes":142,
            "number_of_downvotes":12,
            "if_current_user_upvoted":true,
            "if_current_user_downvotes":false,
            "attitude":"upvote",
            "user":{
                "username":"anonymous",
                "user_guid":0,
                "avatar":"http://www.tmtpost.com/user/default.png",
                "url":"http://www.weibo.com/listen1999.jpg",
                "type":"anonymous" //registered, anoymous, weibo
            }
        },

        {
            "comment_id":12,
            "device_type":"pc",
            "time_created":23189343432,
            "comment_father_id":0,
            "father_commentator_id":17,
            "father_commentator_username":"我是你爸爸",
            "comment":"这是一条评论",
            "is_comment_stared":true,
            "number_of_upvotes":142,
            "number_of_downvotes":12,
            "if_current_user_upvoted":true,
            "if_current_user_downvotes":false,
            "attitude":"upvote",
            "user":{
                "username":"anonymous",
                "user_guid":0,
                "avatar":"http://www.tmtpost.com/user/default.png",
                "url":"http://www.weibo.com/listen1999.jpg",
                "type":"anonymous" //registered, anoymous, weibo
            }
        }

    ],
    "cursor":{
        "total":125,
        "offset":0,
        "limit":30
    },
    "success":"",
    "errors": []
}

                    评论对话  ¶

                    获取评论对话
                    GET/comments/conversations

                    请求参数

                    • comment_id - 必填 评论ID

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/comments/conversations
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "comment_id": 16
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "comment_id": 12,
      "time_created": 231893434,
      "comment_father_id": 0,
      "father_commentator_id": 17,
      "father_commentator_username": "我是你爸爸",
      "comment": "这是一条评论",
      "is_comment_stared": true,
      "number_of_upvotes": 142,
      "number_of_downvotes": 12,
      "if_current_user_upvoted": true,
      "if_current_user_downvotes": false,
      "attitude": "upvote",
      "user": {
        "username": "anonymous",
        "user_guid": 0,
        "avatar": "http://www.tmtpost.com/user/default.png",
        "url": "http://www.weibo.com/listen1999.jpg",
        "type": "anonymous"
      }
    },
    {
      "comment_id": 13,
      "time_created": 231893434,
      "comment_father_id": 0,
      "father_commentator_id": 17,
      "father_commentator_username": "我是你爸爸",
      "comment": "这是一条评论",
      "is_comment_stared": true,
      "number_of_upvotes": 142,
      "number_of_downvotes": 12,
      "if_current_user_upvoted": true,
      "if_current_user_downvotes": false,
      "attitude": "upvote",
      "user": {
        "username": "anonymous",
        "user_guid": 0,
        "avatar": "http://www.tmtpost.com/user/default.png",
        "url": "http://www.weibo.com/listen1999.jpg",
        "type": "anonymous"
      }
    },
    {
      "comment_id": 14,
      "time_created": 231893434,
      "comment_father_id": 0,
      "father_commentator_id": 17,
      "father_commentator_username": "我是你爸爸",
      "comment": "这是一条评论",
      "is_comment_stared": true,
      "number_of_upvotes": 142,
      "number_of_downvotes": 12,
      "if_current_user_upvoted": true,
      "if_current_user_downvotes": false,
      "attitude": "upvote",
      "user": {
        "username": "anonymous",
        "user_guid": 0,
        "avatar": "http://www.tmtpost.com/user/default.png",
        "url": "http://www.weibo.com/listen1999.jpg",
        "type": "anonymous"
      }
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    评论  ¶

                    创建一条评论
                    POST/comments

                    请求参数

                    • commentator - string 选填 评论人的名字 //登录用户是用户名，游客是自己选的名字或系统生成。

                    • entity_guid - integer 必填 被评论的文章GUID

                    • comment - 必填 - 评论内容

                    • father_comment_id - 必填 发布评论所回复的评论ID

                    • captcha_id - 选填 验证码ID

                    • captcha_word - 选填 验证码

                    • attitude - 选填 该评论态度 ‘upvote’(认同) ‘downvote’(不认同)，默认为空

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/comments
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "commentator": "listen1999",
  "entity_guid": 1235,
  "comment": "这是评论内容",
  "father_comment_id": 0,
  "captcha_id": 34,
  "captcha_word": "CWER12"
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "comment_id": 234
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    删除一条评论
                    DELETE/comments

                    请求参数

                    • comment_id - 必填 评论ID

                    Example URI

                    DELETE http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/comments
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "comment_id": 15
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    赞和取消赞  ¶

                    赞
                    POST/comments/{comment_id}/votes

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/comments/23020/votes
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    comment_id
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    评论ID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    取消赞
                    DELETE/comments/{comment_id}/votes

                    Example URI

                    DELETE http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/comments/23020/votes
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    comment_id
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    评论ID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    踩和取消踩  ¶

                    踩
                    POST/comments/{comment_id}/downvotes

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/comments/23020/downvotes

                    comment_id
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    评论ID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    Example URI

                    DELETE http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/comments/23020/downvotes
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    comment_id
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    评论ID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    加精和取消加精  ¶

                    加精
                    POST/comments/{comment_id}/stars

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/comments/23020/stars
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    comment_id
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    评论ID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    取消加精
                    DELETE/comments/{comment_id}/stars

                    Example URI

                    DELETE http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/comments/23020/stars
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    comment_id
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    评论ID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    话题 ¶

                    话题属性

                    默认输出

                    • tag_guid - Integer 话题GUID

                    • tag - String 话题名

                    选择输出

                    • time_created - integet 话题的创建时间

                    • time_post_published - Integer - 最新一篇文章的最后更新时间

                    • tag_image - String 话题LOGO图片URL

                    • description - Text 话题描述

                    • number_of_followers - Integer 话题的关注人数

                    • number_of_posts - Integer 该话题下关联的文章数

                    • is_current_user_following - Boolean 当前用户是否关注了该话题

                    • is_special_report - Boolean 该话题是否是专题

                    • is_special_column - Boolean 该话题是否是特色栏目

                    • categories - Array 话题所属领域

                    • share_link - String 话题分享外链

                    属性说明

                    • 如果用户在请求参数 fields 上设置了 tag_image，用户还需要指定 tag_image_size，(如果未指定，返回话题图片默认尺寸 ) 样例如下：
                    {
    "fields":"tag_image",
    "tag_image_size":["50_50","30_30"]
}
                    • 如果用户在请求参数 fields 上设置了 categories，返回当前话题所属的分类slug值的数组。eg:
                    "categories": [
    "special_report",
    "special"
]

                    全部话题列表  ¶

                    全部话题列表
                    GET/tags/index

                    说明

                    • 默认按照话题的拼音首字母顺序排列

                    请求参数

                    • fields - string 可选 该fields无法获取tag_image和number_of_followers

                    • isletter - boolean 可选 是否按首字母分组查询 default false

                    • letter - string 可选 当isletter为true时，该参数必传，为26个字母和一个‘other’字符串，允许同时传多个，用英文分号连接

                    • limit - interger 可选 当isletter为true时，该参数失效，default 10

                    • offset - interger 可选 当isletter为true时，该参数失效，default 0

                    • category - string 可选 话题分类slug 参考这里

                    返回参数

                    • isletter = false 返回第一种结构

                    • isletter = true 返回第二种结构

                    • 该接口返回的数据中不包含专题

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tags/index
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "tag_guid": "503359",
      "tag": "a380",
      "initial": "a",
      "share_link": " http://www.tmtpost.com/tag/299085",
      "number_of_followers": "1",
      "is_current_user_following": true
    },
    {
      "tag_guid": "500831",
      "tag": "阿北",
      "initial": "a",
      "share_link": " http://www.tmtpost.com/tag/299085",
      "number_of_followers": "0",
      "is_current_user_following": false
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "limit": 2,
    "offset": 0,
    "total": 6834
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "u": [
      {
        "tag_guid": "299019",
        "tag": "Uber",
        "initial": "u",
        "number_of_followers": "9",
        "is_current_user_following": false
      },
      {
        "tag_guid": "505830",
        "tag": "usb",
        "initial": "u",
        "number_of_followers": "1",
        "is_current_user_following": false
      }
    ]
  },
  "cursor": {
    "limit": 2,
    "offset": 0,
    "total": null
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    话题订阅列表  ¶

                    话题订阅列表
                    GET/tags/feeds/{user_guid}

                    说明

                    • 默认按照订阅时间逆序排列

                    请求参数

                    • fields - string 可选

                    • limit - interger 可选 default 10

                    • offset - interger 可选 default 0

                    返回数据

                    参数 类型 描述
                    tag_guid integer 话题GUID
                    tag string 话题名称
                    description string 话题描述

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tags/feeds/100320
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    user_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 100320

                    用户GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "tag_guid": "299161",
      "tag": "创业者说",
      "description": "最有钛度的创业者故事。解构创业企业商业逻辑，解读创业团队生存之道。每周不定期推出钛媒体自采创业团队报道。"
    },
    {
      "tag_guid": "299270",
      "tag": "孟晚舟",
      "description": "任正非的女儿。1993年加入华为，1998年获得硕士学位，历任公司国际会计部总监、香港华为财务总监、账务管理部总裁、销售融资与资金管理部总裁等，2011年4月17日担任华为常务董事兼CFO。"
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "limit": 2,
    "offset": 0,
    "total": 17
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    slug获取话题GUID  ¶

                    slug获取话题GUID
                    GET/tags/slug/{slug}

                    请求参数

                    • slug - 必填 话题别名

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tags/slug/ibm
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    slug
                    string (required) Example: ibm

                    话题的slug值

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "tag_guid": "250517"
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    话题推荐列表  ¶

                    话题推荐列表
                    GET/tags/trends

                    请求参数

                    • types - 必填 需要请求的话题类型 （注意：以下存在的值第一个数字代表N天，N可以为任意正整数,多个用;号连接）

                      • 7_popular (7天内综合使用最热的话题)
                      • 7_related (7天内文章关联最多的话题);
                      • 7_follow (7天内用户关注最多的话题);
                      • 7_company_related (7天内文章关联最多的公司话题);
                      • 7_product_related (7天内文章关联最多的产品话题);
                      • 7_people_related (7天内文章关联最多的人物话题);
                      • 7_company_follow (7天内用户关注最多的公司话题);
                      • 7_product_follow (7天内用户关注最多的产品话题);
                      • 7_people_follow (7天内用户关注最多的人物话题);

                    • limit - 选填 eg: 10;6;5;6;10 和types一一对应，默认每个取10

                    • offset - 选填 eg: 0;0;0;1;2 和types一一对应，默认每个取0

                    • fields - 选填 设置话题自定义输出参数

                    返回参数

                    • frequency - 获取文章关联话题时代表：N天内被关联的文章数，获取用户关注话题时代表N天内关注的用户数

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tags/trends
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "10_related": [
      {
        "tag_guid": "299093",
        "tag": "互联网",
        "description": "钛媒体TMTpost关注传统互联网的发展趋势,分析传统互联网发展的特点和规律,汇聚传统互联网观察者的独到观点。",
        "frequency": "1"
      },
      {
        "tag_guid": "299322",
        "tag": "微博",
        "description": "微博，即微博客（MicroBlog）的简称，是一个基于用户关系的信息分享、传播以及获取平台，用户可以通过WEB、WAP以及各种客户端组建个人社区，以140字左右的文字更新信息，并实现即时分享。",
        "frequency": "1"
      }
    ],
    "10_follow": [
      {
        "tag_guid": "298933",
        "tag": "english",
        "description": "TMTpost in English",
        "frequency": "1"
      }
    ],
    "7_company_related": [],
    "10_people_follow": []
  },
  "cursor": {
    "10_related": {
      "limit": 6,
      "offset": 10,
      "total": 12
    },
    "10_follow": {
      "limit": 6,
      "offset": 0,
      "total": 1
    },
    "7_company_related": {
      "limit": 6,
      "offset": 0,
      "total": 0
    },
    "10_people_follow": {
      "limit": 10,
      "offset": 10,
      "total": 0
    }
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    话题详情  ¶

                    话题详情
                    GET/tag/{tag}

                    请求参数

                    • fields - 必填

                    • is_tag_guid - bool 选填 {tag}是否是否话题GUID, 如果是false,则为话题名, 默认值:false

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tag/商业
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    tag
                    string (required) Example: 商业

                    话题

                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "fields": "tag_image;description;number_of_followers;number_of_posts;if_current_user_following"
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result": "ok",
    "data":[
        {
            "tag_guid":1223,
            "categories":["featured","company"],
            "tag_image":"http://www.tmtpost.com/23223232/avatar.jpg",
            "description":"这是一段有关阿里巴巴的描述",
            "number_of_followers":12
            "is_current_user_following":TRUE
        }
    ],

    "cursor":{},
    "success": "",
    "errors": []
}

                    话题分类列表  ¶

                    话题分类列表
                    GET/tags/categories

                    请求参数

                    参数 类型 是否必需 默认值 描述
                    limit integer y 10
                    offset integer y 0

                    返回数据

                    参数 类型 描述
                    id integer 话题分类ID
                    slug string 话题分类唯一标识
                    value string 话题分类名

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tags/categories
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "12",
      "slug": "company",
      "value": "公司"
    },
    {
      "id": "13",
      "slug": "people",
      "value": "人物"
    },
    {
      "id": "14",
      "slug": "category",
      "value": "导航推荐"
    },
    {
      "id": "15",
      "slug": "sector",
      "value": "行业"
    },
    {
      "id": "83",
      "slug": "special_report",
      "value": "长话题"
    },
    {
      "id": "85",
      "slug": "sponsor",
      "value": "赞助"
    },
    {
      "id": "93",
      "slug": "product",
      "value": "产品"
    },
    {
      "id": "94",
      "slug": "technology",
      "value": "技术"
    },
    {
      "id": "95",
      "slug": "special",
      "value": "特色"
    },
    {
      "id": "96",
      "slug": "output",
      "value": "合作"
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "limit": 10,
    "offset": 0,
    "total": 13
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    按分类获取话题列表  ¶

                    按分类获取话题列表
                    GET/tags/list

                    • 根据分类获取话题

                    请求参数

                    • categories - 选填 话题分类的slug值，默认为 all，更多参考这里 作为字符串，可选择多个分类，用;连接

                    • orderby - 选填 - 默认为 manual(二重排序，先按话题权重，再按话题更新时间) time_updated (话题属性更新时间)，time_created (话题创建时间) time_post_published (话题最新被关联上文章的时间)

                    • sort - 选填 desc (逆序排列) asc (正序排列)

                    • fields - 选填

                    • limit - 选填

                    • offset - 选填

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tags/list
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "categories": "column;recommendation",
  "fields": "is_current_user_following;number_of_followers"
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result": "ok",
    "data":[
        {
            "tag":"话题1",
            "number_of_followers":40,
            "is_current_user_following":true
            "categories":["column","recommendation"]
        },

        {
            "tag":"话题2",
            "number_of_followers":48,
            "is_current_user_following":true
            "categories":["column","recommendation"]
        },

        {
            "tag":"话题3",
            "number_of_followers":0,
            "is_current_user_following":false
            "categories":["column","recommendation"]
        }
    ],

    "cursor":{
        "total":25,
        "limit":10,
        "offset":0
    },

    "success": "",
    "errors": []
}

                    订阅话题/专题/专栏  ¶

                    订阅
                    POST/tags/{guid}/follow

                    请求参数

                    • follow_type - string 必填 可选值 tag (话题，默认值),special_report（专题）,special_column （专栏）

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tags/232030/follow
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    guid
                    integer (required) Example: 232030

                    话题、专题或专栏的GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result": "ok"
    "data":{}
    "cursor":{}
    "success": "",
    "errors": []
}

                    取消
                    DELETE/tags/{guid}/follow

                    请求参数

                    • follow_type - string 必填 可选值 tag (话题，默认值),special_report（专题）,special_column （专栏）

                    Example URI

                    DELETE http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tags/232030/follow
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    guid
                    integer (required) Example: 232030

                    话题、专题或专栏的GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result": "ok"
    "data":{}
    "cursor":{}
    "success": "",
    "errors": []
}

                    专题 ¶

                    说明

                    专题是从话题中派生出的一个类型，所以和话题共享GUID

                    专题属性

                    默认输出

                    • tag_guid - Integer 专题GUID

                    • tag - String 专题名

                    选择输出（话题属性）

                    • time_created - integet 话题的创建时间

                    • time_post_published - Integer - 最新一篇文章的最后更新时间

                    • tag_image - String 话题LOGO图片URL

                    • description - Text 话题描述

                    • is_current_user_following - Boolean 当前用户是否关注了该话题

                    • is_special_report - Boolean 该话题是否是专题

                    • is_special_column - Boolean 该话题是否是特色栏目

                    • categories - Array 话题所属领域

                    • share_link - String 话题分享外链

                    选择输出（专题属性）

                    • number_of_followers - integer 专题订阅数

                    • is_current_user_following - Boolean 当前用户是否关注了该专题

                    • tag_special_background_image - object 专题封面图片

                    属性说明

                    • 如果用户在请求参数 fields 上设置了 tag_special_background_image，用户还需要指定 tag_special_background_image_size，(如果未指定，返回话题图片默认尺寸 ) 样例如下：
                    {
    "fields":"tag_special_background_image",
    "tag_special_background_image_size":["50_50","30_30"]
}

                    专题列表  ¶

                    专题列表
                    GET/tags/special_report/list

                    请求参数

                    • fields - string 可选

                    • limit - interger 可选 default 10

                    • offset - interger 可选 default 0

                    • orderby - 选填 - 默认为 manual(二重排序，先按话题权重，再按话题更新时间) time_updated (话题属性更新时间)，time_created (话题创建时间) time_post_published (话题最新被关联上文章的时间)

                    • sort - 选填 desc (逆序排列) asc (正序排列)

                    • tag_special_background_image_size - json 可选 专题封面图片（tag_special_background_image）尺寸，默认返回原始尺寸的图片

                    返回数据

                    参数 类型 描述
                    tag_guid integer 话题GUID
                    tag string 话题名称
                    description string 话题描述

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tags/special_report/list
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "guid": "299105",
      "tag": "人人都能写电影",
      "description": "钛媒体与华谊兄弟独家战略合作，优势互补，双方将共同在商业影视题材内容生产、制作和传播链条中尝试更多的新鲜玩法。赶紧在微信上搜索“人人都能写电影”，或者微信号：AV_bar，加关注，钛媒体喊你来写故事，你的故事可能被搬上荧幕。在这个微信号里，你将每天收到不少于一个故事素材，并且将由你的投票、评分来决定它是否值得被搬上荧屏。当然，故事的写作者也可能被邀请去电影里打个酱油，演个主角什么的～",
      "tag_special_background_image": {
        "200_100": [
          {
            "url": "http://p31irkb73.bkt.clouddn.com/uploads/tag_images/4e6e6606a3b7d03bed58031fdbf6f3d1.png?imageMogr2/strip/interlace/1/quality/85/format/jpg/thumbnail/200x108/gravity/center/crop/!200x100&ext=.png",
            "description": null,
            "alt": null,
            "size": "200_100",
            "width": "200",
            "height": "100"
          }
        ],
        "original": [
          {
            "url": "http://p31irkb73.bkt.clouddn.com/uploads/tag_images/4e6e6606a3b7d03bed58031fdbf6f3d1.png",
            "description": null,
            "alt": null,
            "size": "original",
            "width": "994",
            "height": "540"
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    {
      "guid": "299142",
      "tag": "六个人的六年双11",
      "description": "阿里会申请“双十一”商标不难理解，没有淘宝和天猫六年前不知道哪来的奇思妙想，把中国光棍节，活生生掰成了“购物狂欢节”之后，也许就没有今天这么奇葩的“双十一”场景了吧。从2009年的27个商家、5000万成交额起步，经过6年的时间，到今年，不知又会不会再破去年的全天350亿元交易额，这真的是一个神奇的节日。。。\n于是钛媒体小做了一个策划，以回访的方式，找到“双十一”这段奇葩历史里的奇葩关键人物，让他们口述的方式，还原一段历史。而每一个个人历史的背后，其实是一个时代的缩影与两个时代的变迁。故而有了这个专题《六个人的六年双11》，这六个人来自市场、技术、运营，乃至行政的不同部门～～～",
      "tag_special_background_image": {}
    },
    {
      "guid": "509111",
      "tag": "【观点争锋】中国移动申请FDD牌照为哪般？",
      "description": "近日，中国移动董事长奚国华在接受媒体专访时表示：中国移动已经向工业和信息化部提出申请FDD牌照。此言一出，再次把关于两种4G技术的争论引向高潮。以混合组网实验的名义去获取FDD牌照，是“明修栈道，暗度陈仓”？还是继续推进TD-LTE的一种举措？看钛媒体作者的不同观点。",
      "tag_special_background_image": {}
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "limit": 3,
    "offset": 0,
    "total": 52
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    专题详情  ¶

                    专题详情
                    GET/tags/special_report/{guid}

                    专题属于话题的一个扩展，所以专题的GUID就是话题GUID

                    请求参数

                    • fields - 话题的自定义属性参数

                    • tag_special_background_image_size - 专题大图的尺寸

                    返回参数

                    • guid - 专题GUID

                    • tag - 专题名

                    • number_of_followers - 专题的订阅数

                    • is_current_user_following - 当前用户是否订阅了该专题

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tags/special_report/100320
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    guid
                    integer (required) Example: 100320

                    专题GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "guid": "299105",
    "tag": "人人都能写电影",
    "description": "钛媒体与华谊兄弟独家战略合作，优势互补，双方将共同在商业影视题材内容生产、制作和传播链条中尝试更多的新鲜玩法。赶紧在微信上搜索“人人都能写电影”，或者微信号：AV_bar，加关注，钛媒体喊你来写故事，你的故事可能被搬上荧幕。在这个微信号里，你将每天收到不少于一个故事素材，并且将由你的投票、评分来决定它是否值得被搬上荧屏。当然，故事的写作者也可能被邀请去电影里打个酱油，演个主角什么的～",
    "number_of_followers": "171",
    "categories": [
      "special_report",
      "special",
      "recommend",
      "m_recommend"
    ],
    "is_current_user_following": true
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    专题订阅列表  ¶

                    专题订阅列表
                    GET/tags/special_report_feeds/{user_guid}

                    说明

                    • 默认按照订阅时间逆序排列

                    请求参数

                    • fields - string 可选

                    • limit - interger 可选 default 10

                    • offset - interger 可选 default 0

                    • tag_special_background_image_size - json 可选 专题封面图片（tag_special_background_image）尺寸，默认返回原始尺寸的图片

                    返回数据

                    参数 类型 描述
                    tag_guid integer 话题GUID
                    tag string 话题名称
                    description string 话题描述

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tags/special_report_feeds/100320
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    user_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 100320

                    用户GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "tag_guid": "299105",
      "tag": "人人都能写电影",
      "description": "钛媒体与华谊兄弟独家战略合作，优势互补，双方将共同在商业影视题材内容生产、制作和传播链条中尝试更多的新鲜玩法。赶紧在微信上搜索“人人都能写电影”，或者微信号：AV_bar，加关注，钛媒体喊你来写故事，你的故事可能被搬上荧幕。在这个微信号里，你将每天收到不少于一个故事素材，并且将由你的投票、评分来决定它是否值得被搬上荧屏。当然，故事的写作者也可能被邀请去电影里打个酱油，演个主角什么的～"
    },
    {
      "tag_guid": "299106",
      "tag": "人人都能写电影2",
      "description": "钛媒体与华谊兄弟独家战略合作，优势互补，双方将共同在商业影视题材内容生产、制作和传播链条中尝试更多的新鲜玩法。赶紧在微信上搜索“人人都能写电影”，或者微信号：AV_bar，加关注，钛媒体喊你来写故事，你的故事可能被搬上荧幕。在这个微信号里，你将每天收到不少于一个故事素材，并且将由你的投票、评分来决定它是否值得被搬上荧屏。当然，故事的写作者也可能被邀请去电影里打个酱油，演个主角什么的～"
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "limit": 10,
    "offset": 0,
    "total": 2
