  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    专栏 ¶

                    说明

                    专栏是从话题中派生出的一个类型，所以和话题共享GUID

                    专栏属性

                    默认输出

                    • tag_guid - Integer 专栏GUID

                    • tag - String 专栏名

                    选择输出（话题属性）

                    • time_created - integet 话题的创建时间

                    • time_post_published - Integer - 最新一篇文章的最后更新时间

                    • tag_image - String 话题LOGO图片URL

                    • description - Text 话题描述

                    • number_of_posts - Integer 该话题下关联的文章数

                    • is_current_user_following - Boolean 当前用户是否关注了该话题

                    • is_special_report - Boolean 该话题是否是专题

                    • is_special_column - Boolean 该话题是否是特色栏目

                    • categories - Array 话题所属领域

                    • share_link - String 话题分享外链

                    选择输出（专栏属性）

                    • number_of_followers - integer 专栏订阅数

                    • is_current_user_following - Boolean 当前用户是否关注了该专栏

                    • column_cover_image - object 专栏封面图片

                    属性说明

                    • 如果用户在请求参数 fields 上设置了 column_cover_image，用户还需要指定 column_cover_image_size，(如果未指定，返回话题图片默认尺寸 ) 样例如下：
                    {
    "fields":"column_cover_image",
    "column_cover_image_size":["50_50","30_30"]
}

                    专栏订阅列表  ¶

                    专栏订阅列表
                    GET/tags/special_column_feeds/{user_guid}

                    说明

                    • 默认按照订阅时间逆序排列

                    请求参数

                    • fields - string 可选

                    • limit - interger 可选 default 10

                    • offset - interger 可选 default 0

                    • special_column_cover_image_size - json 可选 专栏封面图片（column_cover_image）尺寸，默认返回原始尺寸的图片

                    返回数据

                    参数 类型 描述
                    column_guid integer 专栏GUID，本质上也是话题GUID
                    column_title string 专栏标题，非话题名称
                    column_summary string 专栏简介
                    column_cover_image object 专栏封面图片

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tags/special_column_feeds/100320
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    user_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 100320

                    用户GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "column_guid": "299105",
      "column_title": "专栏标题",
      "column_summary": "专栏详情",
      "column_cover_image": {
        "200": [
          {
            "url": "http://7xil86.com2.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/uploads/images/2016/11/cf3b8bfd8d8bf9108663c6cbe589e175_1479434753.jpeg?imageMogr2/thumbnail/200x216/gravity/center/crop/!200x216&ext=.jpeg",
            "description": null,
            "alt": null,
            "size": 200,
            "width": "200",
            "height": "216"
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    {
      "column_guid": "299106",
      "column_title": null,
      "column_summary": null,
      "column_cover_image": {
        "200": [
          {
            "url": "http://7xil86.com2.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/uploads/images/2016/11/cf3b8bfd8d8bf9108663c6cbe589e175_1479434753.jpeg?imageMogr2/thumbnail/200x216/gravity/center/crop/!200x216&ext=.jpeg",
            "description": null,
            "alt": null,
            "size": 200,
            "width": "200",
            "height": "216"
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "limit": 10,
    "offset": 0,
    "total": 1
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    特色专栏详情  ¶

                    特色专栏详情
                    GET/tags/special_column/{column_guid}

                    特色专栏属于话题的一个扩展，所以特色专栏的GUID就是话题GUID

                    请求参数

                    • fields - 话题的自定义属性参数

                    • special_column_cover_image_size - 特色专栏大图的尺寸

                    返回参数

                    • column_guid - 特色专栏GUID

                    • column_title - 特色专栏标题

                    • column_summary - 特色专栏简介

                    • column_cover_image - 特色专栏大图，默认空对象{}

                    • column_authors - 特色专栏主持人，默认空数组[]

                    • number_of_followers - 专栏的订阅数

                    • is_current_user_following - 当前用户是否订阅了该专栏

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tags/special_column/100320
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    column_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 100320

                    特色专栏GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "guid": "298898",
    "title": "特色专栏标题",
    "summary": "特色专栏摘要",
    "cover_image": {
      "original": [
        {
          "url": "http://btm.dev/uploads/images/2016/03/03/QQ20160731-0.png",
          "description": null,
          "alt": null,
          "size": "original",
          "width": "640",
          "height": "1136"
        }
      ]
    },
    "time_published": "1472548038",
    "time_created": "1472548038",
    "time_updated": "1472548038",
    "authors": [
      {
        "guid": "421601",
        "username": "慵懒的猫",
        "is_current_user_following": true,
        "signature": "PHP小王子",
        "avatar": "http://btm.dev/uploads/images/2015/15/default_set/1.png",
        "type_of_verification": "outside"
      }
    ]
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    活动 ¶

                    活动属性

                    字段说明：

                    • time_open - integer 活动开始时间戳，默认null

                    • time_close - integer 活动结束时间戳，默认null

                    • top_banner - object 当活动作为顶部推荐活动时，输出的图片对象

                    • homepage - object 当活动在普通列表中输出时，输出的图片对象

                    • series_cats - array 活动所属系列的属性数组

                    活动列表  ¶

                    获取活动列表（新版）
                    GET/events/list/activity

                    • tip1：列表默认按照open_time逆序排序（活动开始时间）

                    • tip2：默认获取所有活动（内部、外部活动集合）

                    请求参数

                    • series_id - 选填（系列ID）

                    • events_id - 选填（活动ID）

                    • event_attr - 选填（内部活动为1，外部活动为0）

                    • activity_image_size - 选填（活动图片尺寸）

                    • offset - 选填

                    • limit - 选填

                    • orderby - 选填 - 默认open_time

                    • sort - 选填 - 默认DESC

                    • event_channel - 选填 指定输出不同平台的活动，目前支持两个平台tmtpost和tmtpro; 多个用英文分号;连接 eg: tmtpost;tmtpro 默认输出所有平台数据

                    返回数据

                    • series_info - object 系列信息

                    • link_type - auction:竞拍 post:文章 products_test:众测 other:其他

                    默认情况下如果活动不属于任何系列则series_info的结构如下

                    {
    "series_info": {
        "series_id": null,
        "series_name": null
    },
}

                    如果活动属于系列，则series_info的结构如下

                    {
    "series_info": {
        "series_id": "3",
        "series_name": "T-Edge"
    },
}

                    • if_current_user_voted - bool 当前用户是否赞了活动

                    • number_of_upvotes - 点赞数

                    • number_of_shares - 分享数

                    • number_of_comments - 评论数

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/events/list/activity
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "guid": "153471966",
      "event_key": "UHPHGWJHJJMGWSZQ",
      "event_attr": "1",
      "title": "2016 T-EDGE大会",
      "summary": "2016T-EDGE VR 峰会暨2016T-EDGE夏季峰会——T-EDGE代表尖峰、前沿、颠覆，T-EDGE峰会是前沿创新者的国际交流盛会，是钛媒体的品牌产品。2016年，钛媒体将目光投向最前沿的VR行业，与纽约时报中文网联袂推出首届国际虚拟现实产业峰会。",
      "url": "",
      "link_type": null,
      "link_id": null,
      "location": "北京香格里拉酒店",
      "time_open": "1472701560",
      "time_close": "1480563960",
      "status": "",
      "is_enrollment": null,
      "entered_num": 0,
      "top_banner": {
        "original": [
          {
            "url": "http://7xil86.com2.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/uploads/event_images/700-3508.jpg",
            "description": null,
            "alt": null,
            "size": "original",
            "width": 700,
            "height": 350
          }
        ]
      },
      "homepage": {
        "original": [
          {

                    按系列属性获取活动列表  ¶

                    按系列属性获取活动列表
                    GET/events/series_cat_events

                    • tip1：列表默认按照open_time逆序排序（活动开始时间）

                    • tip2：默认获取所有活动（内部、外部活动集合）

                    请求参数

                    • activity_image_size - 选填（活动图片尺寸）

                    • homepage_size - 选填 (推荐活动的大图尺寸)

                    • series_catid - 必填 （活动属性ID）

                    • offset - 选填

                    • limit - 选填

                    • orderby - 选填 - 默认open_time

                    • sort - 选填 - 默认DESC

                    • event_channel - 选填 指定输出不同平台的活动，目前支持两个平台tmtpost和tmtpro; 多个用英文分号;连接 eg: tmtpost;tmtpro 默认输出所有平台数据

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/events/series_cat_events
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "guid": "999889",
      "event_key": "WPYXCZLIRWERQRZG",
      "event_attr": null,
      "title": "2013ti创新大会",
      "summary": "颠覆传统酒店会议模式，忘记酒店，忘记假装的高大上，但仍然逼格满满，更加开放，让高大上的人物走进身边，让只看得着的产品切实可体验，让正襟危坐的开会变成真正开放的交流，让单调的年底你说我听大会，变成真正属于创新热爱者的狂欢节。",
      "url": "http://www.tmtpost.com/event/2013/20131217/",
      "link_type": null,
      "link_id": null,
      "location": "BT图书馆",
      "time_open": "1387252980",
      "time_close": "1450346700",
      "status": "finished",
      "is_enrollment": null,
      "entered_num": 0,
      "top_banner": {
        "original": [
          {
            "url": "http://7xil86.com2.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/uploads/images/2016/03/03/QQ20160731-0.png",
            "description": null,
            "alt": null,
            "size": "original",
            "width": "1127",
            "height": "618"
          }
        ]
      },
      "homepage": {
        "original": [
          {
            "url": "http://7xil86.com2.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/uploads/images/2016/03/03/QQ20160731-2.png",
            "description": null,
            "alt": null,
            "size": "original",
            "width": "1396",
            "height": "1350"
          }
        ]
      },
      "event_detail": null,
      "series_info": {
        "series_id": null,
        "series_name": null
      },
      "series_cats": [
        {
          "series_catid": "199",
          "value": "云计算",
          "slug": "yun"
        },
        {
          "series_catid": "198",
          "value": "VR",
          "slug": "vr"
        }
      ],
      "if_current_user_voted": false,
      "number_of_upvotes": "0",
      "number_of_shares": "0",
      "number_of_comments": "0"
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "limit": 10,
    "offset": 0,
    "total": 1
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    活动系列列表  ¶

                    获取系列列表
                    GET/events/list/series

                    • tip1：列表默认按照ordernum逆序排序（数越大越靠前）

                    请求参数

                    • series_id - 选填（系列ID）

                    • big_img_size - 选填（系列大图尺寸）

                    • logo_img_size - 选填（系列logo尺寸）

                    • tag_image_size - 选填 （系列关联的话题的图片尺寸）

                    • offset - 选填

                    • limit - 选填

                    • sort - 选填（对ordernum字段）

                    返回数据

                    • tags - 关联的话题对象,默认空数组[]
                    "tags": [
    {
        "tag_guid": "298899",
        "tag": "2014MIIC大会",
        "tag_image": "http://btm.dev/uploads/thumb/1a84f280a3b61d59fd2ed8066a1c63fc10d7ed77_50_50.jpeg",
        "number_of_followers": "5"
    },
    {
        "tag_guid": "298900",
        "tag": "2014世界杯",
        "tag_image": null,
        "number_of_followers": "2"
    }
]

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/events/list/series
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "1",
      "series_name": "T-EDGE",
      "descr": "T-eDGE",
      "time_created": "15",
      "time_updated": "12",
      "big_img": {
        "200_200": [
          {
            "url": "http://7xil86.com2.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/uploads/thumb/096ca3ee3550f93dd3c1c61c78406f8b6d2e3326_200_200.jpg",

            "alt": "T-eDGE",
            "size": "200_200",
            "width": 200,
            "height": 200
          }
        ]
      },

            "description": "T-eDGE",
            "alt": "T-eDGE",

                    活动首页推荐  ¶

                    获取首页推荐
                    GET/events/list/homepage

                    • tip1：列表默认按照open_time逆序排序（数越大越靠前）

                    请求参数

                    • homepage_size - 选填（系列大图尺寸）

                    • offset - 选填

                    • limit - 选填

                    • orderby - 选填 - 默认open_time

                    • sort - 选填 - 默认DESC

                    • event_channel - 选填 指定输出不同平台的活动，目前支持两个平台tmtpost和tmtpro; 多个用英文分号;连接 eg: tmtpost;tmtpro 默认输出所有平台数据

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/events/list/homepage
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "guid": "999889",
      "event_key": "WPYXCZLIRWERQRZG",
      "event_attr": null,
      "title": "2013ti创新大会",
      "summary": "颠覆传统酒店会议模式，忘记酒店，忘记假装的高大上，但仍然逼格满满，更加开放，让高大上的人物走进身边，让只看得着的产品切实可体验，让正襟危坐的开会变成真正开放的交流，让单调的年底你说我听大会，变成真正属于创新热爱者的狂欢节。",
      "url": "http://www.tmtpost.com/event/2013/20131217/",
      "link_type": null,
      "link_id": null,

      "top_banner": {

      ],
      "if_current_user_voted": false,
      "number_of_upvotes": "0",
      "number_of_shares": "0",
      "number_of_comments": "0"
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "limit": 10,
    "offset": 0,
    "total": 1
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    获取系列属性详情  ¶

                    获取系列属性详情
                    GET/events/series_cat/{series_catid}

                    请求参数

                    返回参数

                    参数 类型 描述
                    slug string 系列属性唯一标识
                    value string 系列属性名称

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/events/series_cat/23020
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    series_catid
                    integer (required) Example: 23020

                    系列属性ID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "series_catid": "210",
    "slug": "ai",
    "value": "人工智能"
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    获取某系列下所有属性最新活动列表  ¶

                    获取某系列下所有属性最新活动列表
                    GET/events/latest_series_cat_events

                    • tip1：列表默认按照open_time逆序排序（数越大越靠前）

                    • tip2：每一个活动等于系列属性series_cats数组中的第一个对象的最新活动

                    请求参数

                    • series_id - 必填（系列ID）

                    • event_attr - 选填（内部活动为1，外部活动为0）

                    • homepage_size - 选填（系列大图尺寸）

                    • offset - 选填

                    • limit - 选填

                    • orderby - 选填 - 默认open_time

                    • sort - 选填 - 默认DESC

                    • event_channel - 选填 指定输出不同平台的活动，目前支持两个平台tmtpost和tmtpro; 多个用英文分号;连接 eg: tmtpost;tmtpro 默认输出所有平台数据

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/events/latest_series_cat_events
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "guid": "999893",
      "event_key": "ZSXJULLYMUTDPPVG",
      "event_attr": "1",
      "title": "钛.边缘创新年度盛典",
      "summary": "颠覆传统酒店会议模式，忘记酒店，忘记假装的高大上，但仍然逼格满满，更加开放，让高大上的人物走进身边，让只看得着的产品切实可体验，让正襟危坐的开会变成真正开放的交流，让单调的年底你说我听大会，变成真正属于创新热爱者的狂欢节。",
      "url": "http://www.tmtpost.com/event/2014/btweek/",
      "link_type": null,
      "link_id": null,
      "location": "北京",
      "time_open": "1451185660",
      "time_close": "1451443860",
      "status": "soon",
      "is_enrollment": null,
      "entered_num": 0,

                    活动报名  ¶

                    活动报名
                    POST/events/apply

                    请求参数

                    • mimas_user_id - interger require mimas系统中的用户ID

                    • mimas_event_key - string require mimas 系统中的活动key

                    • tmt_event_key - string require tmt 系统中的活动key

                    • user_name - string require 报名人的姓名

                    • mobile - string require 报名人的手机号码 eg:+861XXXXXXXXXX,861XXXXXXXXXX,1XXXXXXXXXX

                    • job_position - string require报名人职位

                    • job_company - string require 报名人公司

                    • event_day - string require 参加的活动日期（秒级时间戳）

                    • email - string require 报名邮箱

                    • need_invoice - boolean 可选，是否需要发票，默认否

                    • invoice_receiver_name - String 当need_invoice=true时该参数为必填，收件人姓名

                    • invoice_contact_msg - String 当need_invoice=true时该参数为必填，收件人联系方式

                    • invoice_address - String 当need_invoice=true时该参数为必填，收件人地址

                    • invoice_title - String 当need_invoice=true时该参数为必填，发票抬头

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/events/apply
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    检测用户是否已经报名  ¶

                    检测用户是否已经报名
                    GET/events/check_apply

                    请求参数

                    • tmt_event_key - string require tmt的活动key

                    返回数据

                    • is_apply - boolean 是否已报名 true: 已报名; false: 未报名

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/events/check_apply
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    获取已报名用户的报名信息  ¶

                    获取已报名用户的报名信息
                    GET/events/apply_info

                    请求参数

                    • tmt_event_key - string require tmt的活动key

                    • need_invoice_info - Boolean 可选，是否需要输出发票信息

                    返回数据

                    • tmt_user_guid - integer 钛媒体用户ID

                    • tmt_event_key - string 钛媒体活动key

                    • user_name - string 报名人真实姓名

                    • mobile - string 报名人手机号码

                    • email - string 报名邮箱

                    • job_position - string 职位

                    • job_company - string 公司

                    • apply_status - string 报名状态

                    • apply_type - string 报名类型

                    • event_day - string 参会的日期

                    • apply_unix_time - integer 报名时间戳

                    • human_apply_time - integer 友好的报名时间

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/events/apply_info
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "tmt_user_guid": "421601",
    "tmt_event_key": "ZPYSMKPXUSBDHPCZ",
    "user_name": "谢明究",
    "mobile": "",
    "email": "ir.xiaoyan@gmail.com",
    "job_position": null,
    "job_company": null,
    "event_day": null,
    "apply_status": "报名未审核",
    "apply_type": "free",
    "apply_unix_time": "1451895311",
    "mimas_user_id": "17325",
    "human_apply_time": "2016-01-04 16:15",
    "invoice_data": {
      "need_invoice": true,
      "invoice_receiver_name": "阿究",
      "invoice_contact_msg": "18510683002",
      "invoice_address": "北京市朝阳区四惠东通惠河畔文化创意产业园区通惠大厦C区3楼",
      "invoice_title": "北京文德致远"
    }
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    修改报名审核状态  ¶

                    获取已报名用户的报名信息
                    PUT/events/apply_status

                    请求参数

                    • mimas_event_key - string mimas的活动key

                    • mimas_user_id - integer mimas上的用户ID

                    • apply_status - integer 审核状态，已mimas上的状态标识为准

                    Example URI

                    PUT http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/events/apply_status
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    钛坦白活动加群申请  ¶

                    钛坦白活动加群申请
                    POST/events/apply_wechat_course

                    need login && tmtpro

                    请求参数

                    • series_catid - 活动系列属性series_catid。 多个用英文分号;连接

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/events/apply_wechat_course
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    缴费成功添加钛币  ¶

                    mimas平台活动缴费成功后给用户添加钛币和贡献值
                    POST/events/pay_success

                    说明：因为缴费成功后的回调地址在mimas系统中，所以该接口需要在mimas上获取支付成功的回调状态后再发起请求

                    请求参数

                    • mimas_event_key - string mimas的活动key

                    • mimas_user_id - integer mimas上的用户ID

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/events/pay_success
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    需要支付类活动报名  ¶

                    需要支付类活动报名
                    POST/events/pay_apply

                    请求参数

                    • goods_guid - string require 商品GUID

                    • tmt_event_key - string require tmt 系统中的活动key

                    • user_name - string require 报名人的姓名

                    • mobile - string require 报名人的手机号码

                    • email - string require 报名邮箱

                    • job_position - string 可选 报名人职位

                    • job_company - string 可选 报名人公司

                    • record_is_unique - string 可选 是否只能报一次名

                    部分错误类型

                    httpcode field message
                    406 event no found 活动不存在
                    406 have applied this event 您已经报名了
                    406 goods no found 商品不存在
                    406 email/mobile already events registered 该邮箱/手机号已经报过名

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/events/pay_apply
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "id": 1
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "ok",
  "errors": []
}

                    获取需要支付类活动用户报名信息  ¶

                    获取需要支付类活动用户报名信息
                    GET/events/{user_unique_key}/pay_apply_info

                    请求参数

                    • tmt_event_key - string require tmt的活动key

                    返回数据

                    • user_guid - integer 钛媒体用户ID

                    • tmt_event_key - string 钛媒体活动key

                    • payment_order_guid - integer 订单GUID

                    • user_name - string 报名人真实姓名

                    • email - string 报名邮箱

                    • mobile - string 报名人手机号码

                    • job_company - string 公司

                    • job_position - string 职位

                    • code - string 二维码

                    • status - string 报名状态 paid(已支付),unpaid(未支付),deleted(删除)

                    • apply_time - integer 报名时间戳

                    • time_updated - integer

                    • paid_time - integer 支付时间戳

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/events/100-sk-we200/pay_apply_info
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    user_unique_key
                    string (required) Example: 100-sk-we200

                    用户唯一识别码

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "user_guid": "2533469",
    "tmt_event_key": "IMFAZOCNFPWHJJDA",
    "payment_order_guid": "0",
    "user_name": "刘志豪",
    "email": "834281422@qq.com",
    "mobile": "18501144707",
    "job_company": "钛媒体",
    "job_position": "phper",
    "code": "#VJzFouSyjZX4ckJi",
    "status": "paid",
    "apply_time": "1490773383",
    "time_updated": "1490774383",
    "paid_time": null,
    "goods": {
      "goods_guid": "2",
      "goods_type": "t-edge",
      "goods_title": "VIP",
      "general_price": "620",
      "pro_price": "512"
    }
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "ok",
  "errors": []
}

                    广告 ¶

                    广告位置

                    • ios_inside_top - iOS横幅顶部广告

                    • android_inside_top - Android横幅顶部广告

                    • ios_inside_bottom - iOS横幅底部广告

                    • android_inside_bottom - Android横幅底部广告

                    • ios_opening - iOS开屏广告

                    • android_opening - Android开屏广告

                    • ios_pop-up - iOS弹窗广告

                    • android_pop-up - Android弹窗广告

                    广告位物料  ¶

                    广告位物料
                    GET/ad/position

                    请求参数

                    参数 类型 是否必需 默认值 描述
                    position_type string y no default 广告位名称,目前支持参考广告模块顶部广告位置说明
                    ad_image_size json y no default 广告位上图片广告物料对应的尺寸

                    输出参数

                    • time_start - 该广告展示的开始时间

                    • time_end - 该广告结束时间

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/ad/position
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "position_name": "iOS开屏广告",
    "position_type": "ios-open-ad",
    "time_start": "1431685800",
    "time_end": "1500840888",
    "ad_guid": "1341759",
    "ad_type": "image",
    "ad_title": "MIIC大会专题",
    "ad_link": "http://www.tmtpost.com/tag/298899",
    "ad_image": {
      "1920_1080": [
        {
          "url": "http://images.tmtpost.com/uploads/images/2012/11/137482378166.jpg?imageMogr2/thumbnail/1920x1237/gravity/center/crop/!1920x1080&ext=.jpg",
          "description": null,
          "alt": null,
          "size": "1920_1080",
          "width": "1920",
          "height": "1080"
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    积分 ¶

                    规则说明  ¶

                    获取规则说明
                    GET/credits/rules

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/credits/rules
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result":"ok",
    "data":{
        "q&a":[
            {
                "subtitle":"什么是钛有礼？",
                "text":"这是文字说明"
            },
            {
                "subtitle":"什么是钛有礼？",
                "text":"这是文字说明"
            },
            {
                "subtitle":"什么是钛有礼？",
                "text":"这是文字说明"
            }
        ],

        "rules":[
            {
                "action":"用户以电子邮箱注册新账号",
                "wealth_index":40,
                "contribution_index":12,
                "restriction":"仅限一次，不能兼得「授权社交账号」奖励",
                "notes":""
            },

            {
                "action":"用户以电子邮箱注册新账号",
                "wealth_index":40,
                "contribution_index":12,
                "restriction":"仅限一次，不能兼得「授权社交账号」奖励",
                "notes":""
            },

            {
                "action":"用户以电子邮箱注册新账号",
                "wealth_index":40,
                "contribution_index":12,
                "restriction":"仅限一次，不能兼得「授权社交账号」奖励",
                "notes":""
            },

            {
                "action":"用户以电子邮箱注册新账号",
                "wealth_index":40,
                "contribution_index":12,
                "restriction":"仅限一次，不能兼得「授权社交账号」奖励",
                "notes":""
            },

            {
                "action":"用户以电子邮箱注册新账号",
                "wealth_index":40,
                "contribution_index":12,
                "restriction":"仅限一次，不能兼得「授权社交账号」奖励",
                "notes":""
            },
        ]
    },
    "cursor":{},
    "success":"",
    "errors":[]
}

                    对账单  ¶

                    查询交易记录
                    GET/credits/{user_unique_key}

                    请求参数

                    • limit - 选填

                    • offset - 选填

                    返回数据

                    • time_created - Integer - 交易发生时间

                    • action - String - 行为

                    • contribution_index - Float - 行为贡献值

                    • wealth_index - Float - 行为财富值

                    • data - Array - 相关数据信息

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/credits/cd-sdds-ds-sd-sdsds
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    user_unique_key
                    string (required) Example: cd-sdds-ds-sd-sdsds

                    用户唯一识别码

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "time_created": 1306836623,
      "action": "注册",
      "contribution_index": 50,
      "wealth_index": 50,
      "data": {}
    },
    {
      "time_created": 1306836625,
      "action": "每日登录",
      "contribution_index": 50,
      "wealth_index": 50,
      "data": {}
    },
    {
      "time_created": 1306836625,
      "action": "发表新文章",
      "contribution_index": 0,
      "wealth_index": 5,
      "data": {
        "post_guid": 12
      }
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "total": 30,
    "offset": 0,
    "limit": 10
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    充值卡充值  ¶

                    充值卡充值
                    POST/credits/charge

                    请求参数

                    • cardno - 必填，充值卡号

                    返回数据

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/credits/charge
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "charged success",
  "errors": []
}

                    获取兑吧登陆URL  ¶

                    获取兑吧登陆URL
                    POST/credits/buildurl

                    请求参数

                    • redirect - String ，登陆后需要重定向的地址， 请求时务必要将该参数urlencode处理

                    返回数据

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/credits/buildurl
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "url": "http://www.duiba.com.cn/autoLogin/autologin?uid=ulls5sssnmmn&credits=2889&appKey=R5mVq3B62T2LFHiQGxgvsWs8uLp&sign=be232c239ad85386f1e2505ff0780738&timestamp=1428644301000&vip=0&redirect="
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    意见 ¶

                    讨论主题  ¶

                    获取一个讨论主题
                    GET/discussions/{discussion_guid}

                    返回数据

                    • title - String

                    • main - Text

                    • author - Array

                    • time_created - Integer

                    • tags - Array

                    • number_of_comments - Integer

                    • number_of_votes - Integer

                    • number_of_followers - Integer

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/discussions/999888
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    discussion_guid
                    integer (required) Example: 999888

                    意见与建议GUID；固定为999888

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "title": "讨论标题",
    "main": "讨论内容",
    "number_of_votes": 120,
    "number_of_comments": 200,
    "number_of_followers": 12,
    "time_published": 1306836623,
    "author": {
      "author_guid": 12,
      "author_username": "listen1999"
    },
    "tag": [
      {
        "tag_guid": 12,
        "tag": "apple",
        "category": [
          "people",
          "company"
        ]
      },
      {
        "tag_guid": 13,
        "tag": "apple",
        "category": [
          "people",
          "company"
        ]
      }
    ]
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    提交意见  ¶

                    提交意见
                    POST/discussions/suggest

                    返回数据

                    • mobile - string 可选

                    • email - string 可选

                    • platform - String, 必选 平台，多选， 存在多个用英文逗号连接 目前存在的平台包括 pc,ipad,ipad_hd,iphone,android,h5

                    • content - text 意见描述信息 必选

                    PC端和H5上：游客和未验证用户需要填写验证码，下面两个参数则为必填项

                    • captcha_id - Integer

                    • captcha_word - String

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/discussions/suggest
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    消息 ¶

                    未读消息数  ¶

                    获取未读消息数
                    GET/notifications/count/unread

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/notifications/count/unread
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "count": 300
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    通知列表  ¶

                    获取通知列表
                    GET/notifications/list

                    请求参数

                    • time_start - 选填

                    • time_end - 选填

                    • limit - 选填

                    • offset - 选填

                    说明: 如果 time_start 被赋值，代表“下拉刷新”，取 time_start之后的“未读”消息；如果 time_end被赋值，代表“上拉加载”，取 time_end 之前的“已读”或“未读”的消息列表。 第一次进入消息列表时，time_end 是用户请求消息列表时的当前时间。

                    返回数据

                    • id - Integer - 消息ID

                    • time_created - Integer - 消息被创建的时间

                    • message - String - 消息内容

                    • is_read - Boolean - 是否是已读

                    • data - Array - 关联数据

                    tips: 因为历史原因，所有评论类的通知中对象名使用了“post_”前缀的对象名代表的评论对象不一定只是文章，可能是产品，意见与建议等等，为了区分评论对象的属性，通知data字段中增加了subtype参数，用来标识目前可能存在的评论对象，（post,product_show,discussions）, 需要注意的是，subtype是后期可扩展的，请开发同学注意到这点。

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/notifications/list
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "time_start": "",
  "time_end": 1306836623
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result":"ok",
    "data":[
        {
            "id":1,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"这是一个通用类型的通知。",
            "is_read":true,
            "data":{
                "type":"general"
            }
        },

        {
            "id":2,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"你关注的话题，“阿里巴巴”，有新文章发布：《这是一个文章标题》",
            "is_read":true,
            "data":{
                "type":"new_post_by_following_tag",
                "post_guid":1234,
                "post_title":"这是文章标题",
                "following_tag":"阿里巴巴",
                "following_tag_guid":1232,
            }
        },

        {
            "id":3,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"你关注的作者“赵何娟”，发布了一篇新文章：《这是文章标题》",
            "is_read":true,
            "data":{
                "type":"new_post_by_following_user",
                "post_guid":1232,
                "post_title":"这是文章标题",
                "following_username":"赵何娟",
                "following_user_guid":1232
            }
        },

        {
            "id":4,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"“林森”关注了你。",
            "is_read":true,
            "data":{
                "type":"new_follower",
                "follower_user_guid":1232,
                "follower_username":"listen1999"
            }
        },

        {
            "id":5,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"“林森”评论了你的文章。",
            "is_read":true,
            "data":{
                "type":"new_comment",
                "comment_id":1232,
                "comment":"这是评论内容",
                "post_title":"这是评论对象标题",
                "comentator_guid":1232,
                "comentator_usename":"listen1999",
                "subtype":"post"
            }
        },

        {
            "id":6,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"“林森”评论了你在《文章标题》下的评论：",
            "is_read":true,
            "data":{
                "type":"new_reply_comment",
                "post_title":"这是评论对象标题",
                "comment_id":1232,
                "comment":"这是评论内容",
                "comentator_guid":1232,
                "comentator_usename":"listen1999",
                "subtype":"post"
            }
        },

        {
            "id":7,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"你在《标题》下的一条评论被置顶。",
            "is_read":true,
            "data":{
                "type":"comment_starred",
                "post_guid":1232,
                "post_title":"这是评论对象标题",
                "comment_id":1232,
                "comment":"这是评论内容",
                "comentator_guid":"1",
                "comentator_usename":"凌仕",
                "subtype":"post"
            }
        },

        {
            "id":7,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"慵懒的猫赞了你在文章《【1031晨报】移动业务免费时代会终结吗？》下的评论",
            "is_read":false,
            "data":{
                "type":"upvote_comment",
                "comment_id":1232,
                "comment":"这是评论内容",
                "post_guid":1232,
                "post_title":"这是评论对象标题",
                "comentator_guid":"1",
                "comentator_usename":"凌仕",
                "vote_user_name":"测试账号",
                "vote_user_guid":"421501",
                "subtype":"post"
            }
        },

        {
            "id":7,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"慵懒的猫赞了你在产品《【1031晨报】移动业务免费时代会终结吗？》下的评论",
            "is_read":false,
            "data":{
                "type":"upvote_comment",
                "comment_id":1232,
                "comment":"这是评论内容",
                "post_guid":1232,
                "post_title":"这是评论对象标题",
                "comentator_guid":"1",
                "comentator_usename":"凌仕",
                "vote_user_name":"测试账号",
                "vote_user_guid":"421501",
                "subtype":"product_show"
            }
        },

        {
            "id":7,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"慵懒的猫赞了你的文章《电信反腐不应是重分利益蛋糕》",
            "is_read":false,
            "data":{
                "type":"upvote_entity",
                "post_guid":1232,
                "post_title":"这是评论对象标题",
                "vote_user_name":"测试账号",
                "vote_user_guid":"421501",
                "subtype":"post"
            }
        },

        {
            "id":7,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"慵懒的猫看好了你的产品《好产品》",
            "is_read":false,
            "data":{
                "type":"upvote_entity",
                "post_guid":1232,
                "post_title":"这是评论对象标题",
                "vote_user_name":"测试账号",
                "vote_user_guid":"421501",
                "subtype":"product_show"
            }
        },

        {
            "id":8,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"抱歉，你提交的文章《文章标题》未能通过审核，拒稿理由：",
            "is_read":true,
            "data":{
                "type":"post_rejected",
                "post_guid":1232,
                "post_title":"文章标题",
                "text":"这里是拒稿理由"
            }
        },

        {
            "id":9,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"恭喜，你提交的文章《文章标题》，已审核通过，于 2013-12-12: 12:13 发布。",
            "is_read":true,
            "data":{
                "type":"post_approved",
                "post_guid":1232,
                "post_title":"文章标题",
                "time_published":34342323232,
            }
        },

        {
            "id":10,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"抱歉，你报名参加的活动“活动名称”未能通过审核。",
            "is_read":true,
            "data":{
                "type":"event_application_refused",
                "event_guid":1232,
                "event_title":"这是活动名称",
            }
        },

        {
            "id":10,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"你提交的我是一个好产品产品众测已经进入审核阶段。",
            "is_read":true,
            "data":{
                "type":"apply_test",
                "test_guid": 1234
            }
        },

        {
            "id":10,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"你提交的[我是一个好产品]产品众测报告已经进入审核阶段。",
            "is_read":true,
            "data":{
                "type":"summit_test_report",
                "test_guid": 1234,
                "test_report_guid": 123435
            }
        },

        {
            "id":11,
            "time_created":1306836623,
            "message":"恭喜，你报名参加的活动，“活动名称” 已通过审核，请准时参加",
            "is_read":true,
            "data":{
                "type":"event_application_approved",
                "event_guid":1232,
                "event_title":"这是活动名称",
            }
        }

    ],

    "cursor":{},
    "success": "",
    "errors": []
}

                    推送 ¶

                    客户端中可能的推送类型

                    • 通知 - 自定义参数示例：{“push_type”:“notify”}

                    • 文章 - 自定义参数示例：{“push_type”:“post”,“post_guid”:“111111”}

                    • 活动 - 自定义参数示例：{“push_type”:“event”,“guid”:“111111”}

                    • 竞拍 - 自定义参数示例：{“push_type”:“auction”,“guid”:“111111”}

                    • 专题 - 自定义参数示例：{“push_type”:“special-report”,“guid”:“111111”}

                    • 作者 - 自定义参数示例：{“push_type”:“author”,“guid”:“111111”}

                    • URL - 自定义参数示例：{“push_type”:“url”,“url”:"http://www.tmtpost.com/abc.html"}

                    更新推送令牌  ¶

                    更新推送令牌
                    POST/utilities/device_token

                    请求参数

                    • device_token - string 必填 推送令牌

                    • is_first_open - bool 选填 当第一次打开app时，必传且值为true。之后可以不用传或传false

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/device_token
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "device_token": "24343242424sdwrsf",
  "is_first_open": true
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    推送设置  ¶

                    推送设置
                    PUT/utilities/push_setting

                    请求参数

                    • device_token - 必填

                    • news - 选填

                    • notify - 选填

                    Example URI

                    PUT http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/push_setting
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "device_token": "24343242424sdwrsf",
  "news": true,
  "notify": true
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    快讯 ¶

                    字段属性

                    • guid - integer 瞬眼天下GUID

                    • title - text 瞬眼天下标题

                    • main - text 瞬眼天下摘要

                    • detail - text 瞬眼天下详情

                    • word_image - Array 瞬眼天下图片

                    • type - string 瞬眼天下类型，目前存在 ‘post’ (文章, 可能后期也会增加其他的类型，比如tag, author等等，请注意异常处理), ‘common_text’ (纯文本), ‘outside_link’ (外部链接)

                    • related_guid - integer 相关联type对应的GUID

                    • related_url - string type为outside_link时使用

                    • author_name - string 作者名

                    • number_of_bookmarks - integer 收藏数

                    • number_of_shares - integer 分享数

                    • number_of_comments - integer 评论数

                    • number_of_reads - integer 阅读数

                    • number_of_upvotes - integer 喜欢数

                    • number_of_downvotes - integer 踩数

                    • if_current_user_bookmarked - bool 当前用户是否收藏瞬眼天下

                    • if_current_user_voted - bool 当前用户是否赞了瞬眼天下

                    • if_current_user_downvoted - bool 当前用户是否踩了瞬眼天下

                    • word_thumbnail_image - Array 瞬眼天下缩略图

                    设置输出(fields)：

                    • special_report - array, 瞬眼天下关联的专题列表，默认空数组[],结构如下
                    "special_report": [
    {
        "guid": "299105",
        "tag": "人人都能写电影"
    }
]
                    • word_thumbnail_image - array, 瞬眼天下图片缩略图，默认空数组[],结构如下
                    "word_thumbnail_image": {
    "300_200": [
        {
            "url": "http://images.tmtpost.com/uploads/images/2017/09/20170906114734836.jpg?imageMogr2/quality/85/thumbnail/300x49/gravity/center/crop/!300x49&ext=.jpg",
            "description": null,
            "alt": null,
            "size": "300_49",
            "width": "300",
            "height": "49"
        }
    ]
}
                    • word_comments - array, 瞬眼天下评论，默认空数组[],结构如下
                    "word_comments": [
    {
        "comment_id": "527706",
        "device_type": "iphone",
        "time_created": "1505370190",
        "comment_father_id": "1",
        "father_commentator_id": "233361",
        "father_commentator_username": "任铮",
        "comment": "这是一条评论",
        "is_comment_stared": false,
        "number_of_upvotes": "0",
        "number_of_downvotes": "0",
        "if_current_user_upvoted": false,
        "if_current_user_downvotes": false,
        "attitude": null,
        "user": {
            "username": "iclzh2",
            "user_guid": "1709811",
            "avatar": "http://images.tmtpost.com/uploads/avatar/1709811_1471852849.png",
            "url": null,
            "type": "register"
        }
    }
]

                    列表  ¶

                    瞬眼天下列表
                    GET/word/list

                    请求参数

                    • type - string 选填 word(快讯), notice(公告), view(观点) 默认word

                    • orderby - string 选填

                      • time_published - 发布时间 默认排序
                      • time_updated - 修改时间
                      • time_created - 创建时间

                    • sort - 选填

                      • desc - 默认
                      • asc

                    • limit - 选填

                    • offset - 选填

                    • platform - 选填，选择对应平台下的瞬眼天下列表，可选值 ‘pc’ (pc列表) 、‘app_list’ (app列表) 、 ‘app’ （app卡片）， 默认输出所有

                    • fields - string 选填 瞬眼的设置输出项，多个用分号连接

                    • comment_device_type - String - 选填 获取指定平台下的评论列表

                      • all - 默认为“all”，输出全部设备的评论
                      • "ios;android;pc;h5" - string 用户也可以在字符串中指定一台或多台设备

                    • comment_orderby - String 选填

                      • mixed - 默认排序：加精在前，其它在后（按“votes”排序两个列表）
                      • time_created - 创建时间
                      • votes - 被赞数

                    • comment_if_starred_only - Boolean 选填，默认为 false

                    • comment_limit - Integer 选填

                    • comment_offset - Integer 选填

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/word/list
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "guid": "63",
      "title": "瞬眼天下标题",
      "main": "瞬眼天下摘要",
      "detail": "瞬眼天下详情",
      "word_image": {
        "20_20": [
          {
            "url": "http://images.tmtpost.com/uploads/images/2017/08/a2b5b1d4994a1b016c57a84bc53faa51_1503546127.jpeg?imageMogr2/quality/85/thumbnail/35x20/gravity/center/crop/!20x20&ext=.jpeg",
            "description": null,
            "alt": null,
            "size": "20_20",
            "width": "20",
            "height": "20"
          }
        ]
      },
      "type": "outside_link",
      "author_name": "谢明究",
      "related_guid": null,
      "related_url": "http://www.baidu.com",
      "time_published": "1470637497",
      "number_of_upvotes": "11",
      "number_of_bookmarks": "23",
      "number_of_shares": "11",
      "number_of_comments": "11",
      "number_of_reads": "10",
      "if_current_user_voted": false,
      "if_current_user_bookmarked": false,
      "word_thumbnail_image": {
        "200_200": [
          {
            "url": "http://images.tmtpost.com/uploads/images/2017/09/20170904163541795.jpg?imageMogr2/quality/85/thumbnail/200x150&ext=.jpg",
            "description": null,
            "alt": null,
            "size": "200_150",
            "width": "200",
            "height": "150"
          }
        ]
      },
      "special_report": [
        {
          "guid": "299105",
          "tag": "人人都能写电影"
        }
      ],
      "word_comments": [
        {
          "comment_id": "63",
          "device_type": "iphone",
          "time_created": "1505370190",
          "comment_father_id": "1",
          "father_commentator_id": "233361",
          "father_commentator_username": "任铮",
          "comment": "这是一条评论",
          "is_comment_stared": false,
          "number_of_upvotes": "0",
          "number_of_downvotes": "0",
          "if_current_user_upvoted": false,
          "if_current_user_downvotes": false,
          "attitude": null,
          "user": {
            "username": "iclzh2",
            "user_guid": "1709811",
            "avatar": "http://images.tmtpost.com/uploads/avatar/1709811_1471852849.png",
            "url": null,
            "type": "register"
          }
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "guid": "66",
      "title": "瞬眼天下标题",
      "main": "瞬眼天下摘要",
      "detail": "瞬眼天下详情",
      "word_image": {
        "20_20": [
          {
            "url": "http://images.tmtpost.com/uploads/images/2017/08/a2b5b1d4994a1b016c57a84bc53faa51_1503546127.jpeg?imageMogr2/quality/85/thumbnail/35x20/gravity/center/crop/!20x20&ext=.jpeg",

                    话题关联的瞬眼列表  ¶

                    话题关联瞬眼列表
                    GET/word/list/tag/{tag}

                    请求参数

                    • is_tag_guid - bool 选填，url上的{tag}参数是否是ID而不是话题名, 默认false

                    • orderby - string 选填

                      • time_published - 发布时间 默认排序
                      • time_updated - 修改时间
                      • time_created - 创建时间

                    • sort - 选填

                      • desc - 默认
                      • asc

                    • limit - 选填

                    • offset - 选填

                    • platform - 选填，选择对应平台下的瞬眼天下列表，可选值 ‘pc’ (pc列表) 、‘app_list’ (app列表) 、 ‘app’ （app卡片）， 默认输出所有

                    • fields - string 选填 瞬眼的设置输出项，多个用分号连接

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/word/list/tag/100430/ibm
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    tag
                    integer/string (required) Example: 100430/ibm

                    话题GUID或者话题名

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "guid": "63",
      "title": "瞬眼天下标题",
      "main": "瞬眼天下摘要",
      "detail": "瞬眼天下详情",
      "word_image": {
        "original": [

                    详情  ¶

                    瞬眼天下详情
                    GET/word/detail/{guid}

                    请求参数

                    • fields - string 选填 瞬眼的设置输出项，多个用分号连接

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/word/detail/100430
                    URI Parameters
                    HideShow
                    guid
                    integer (required) Example: 100430

                    瞬眼天下GUID

                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "guid": "1021863",
    "title": "瞬眼天下标题",
    "main": "瞬眼天下摘要",
    "detail": "瞬眼天下详情",
    "word_image": {
      "original": [
        {
          "url": "http://images.tmtpost.com/uploads/images/2017/08/a2b5b1d4994a1b016c57a84bc53faa51_1503546127.jpeg",
          "description": null,
          "alt": null,
          "size": "original",
          "width": "600",
          "height": "337"
        }
      ]
    },
    "type": "post",
    "author_name": "谢明究",
    "related_guid": "63",
    "related_url": null,
    "time_published": "1470637497",
    "number_of_upvotes": "11",
    "number_of_bookmarks": "23",
    "number_of_shares": "11",
    "number_of_comments": "11",
    "number_of_reads": "10",
    "if_current_user_voted": false,
    "if_current_user_bookmarked": false,
    "word_thumbnail_image": {
      "200_200": [
        {
          "url": "http://images.tmtpost.com/uploads/images/2017/09/20170904163541795.jpg?imageMogr2/quality/85/thumbnail/200x150&ext=.jpg",
          "description": null,
          "alt": null,
          "size": "200_150",
          "width": "200",
          "height": "150"
        }
      ]

        "guid": "299105",
        "tag": "人人都能写电影"
      }
    ],
    "word_comments": [

        "comment_id": "1021863",
        "device_type": "iphone",

  "success": "",

                    多媒体 ¶

                    媒体类

                    上传  ¶

                    上传
                    POST/mms/upload

                      1. 请求报文的内容以multipart/form-data格式组织，具体细节请参考Multipart格式。
                      1. 允许同时上传多个文件, 只需要保证将多个文件使用不同的参数名传递, 存在文件的参数名使用数字和字母组合自定义
                      1. 只有所有文件全部上传成功时，result才会等于ok,否则为no_ok, 当部分上传成功时，不成功的文件失败信息会已数组的形式放在errors对象中，其中field等于上传时键值对的key名，成功的文件信息已对象的形式存放在data中，其中对象名为上传时键值对的key名。
                      1. 该接口限制每个IP每天存取外链和上传共200次

                    请求参数

                    参数 类型 是否必需 默认值 描述
                    need_crop boolean n false 可选 是否需要裁剪 默认 false
                    x_axis integer n/y NULL need_crop=true时必填 裁剪时的x轴偏移量
                    y_axis integer n/y NULL need_crop=true时必填 裁剪时的y轴偏移量
                    width integer n/y NULL need_crop=true时必填 裁剪时的目标图片宽度
                    height integer n/y NULL need_crop=true时必填 裁剪时的目标图片高度

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/mms/upload
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    POST /v1/mms/upload HTTP/1.1
Host: api-post.tmtpost.dev
Accept: application/json
app_key: 2015042403
app_secret: F3x47g39Wc4M96nwA28T
access_token: 19bfdf5cbb6defef1857933cff977a0c79c7d296
user_unique_key: 9e6b70e4-f5a1-11e4-8a51-00163e0231ed
app_version: 8.0
device: iPhone
identifier: R6dfJlfxH1L2z6KrLTQYJcYFhyt9sTyt
Cache-Control: no-cache

----WebKitFormBoundaryE19zNvXGzXaLvS5C
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="filename1"; filename="正则表达式30分钟入门教程.pdf"
Content-Type: application/pdf

----WebKitFormBoundaryE19zNvXGzXaLvS5C
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="filename2"; filename="6AA9E47B8BACFA390E77C7069EE37412.jpg"
Content-Type: image/jpeg

----WebKitFormBoundaryE19zNvXGzXaLvS5C
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="filename3"; filename="2011-09-10 19.37.44.jpg"
Content-Type: image/jpeg

----WebKitFormBoundaryE19zNvXGzXaLvS5C
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "no_ok",
  "data": {
    "bbbb": {
      "file_name": "logo_black10.png",
      "file_type": "image/png",
      "raw_name": "logo_black10",
      "orig_name": "logo_black.png",
      "client_name": "logo_black.png",
      "file_ext": ".png",
      "file_size": 45.88,
      "is_image": true,
      "image_width": 288,
      "image_height": 288,
      "image_type": "png",
      "image_size_str": "width=\"288\" height=\"288\"",
      "file_url": "http://img.businessvalue.com.cn/uploads/filetemp/20150724/logo_black10.png"
    },
    "ccc": {
      "file_name": "logo_black11.png",
      "file_type": "image/png",
      "raw_name": "logo_black11",
      "orig_name": "logo_black.png",
      "client_name": "logo_black.png",
      "file_ext": ".png",
      "file_size": 45.88,
      "is_image": true,
      "image_width": 288,
      "image_height": 288,
      "image_type": "png",
      "image_size_str": "width=\"288\" height=\"288\"",
      "file_url": "http://img.businessvalue.com.cn/uploads/filetemp/20150724/logo_black11.png"
    }
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": [
    {
      "field": "aaaa",
      "message": "upload_invalid_filetype"
    },
    {
      "field": "ddd",
      "message": "upload_invalid_filetype"
    }
  ]
}

                    存取外链图  ¶

                    存取外链图
                    POST/mms/fetch

                    该接口仅支持存取外链图片 该接口要求钛媒体用户登录并账号已验证 该接口限制每个IP每天存取外链和上传共200次

                    请求参数

                    参数 类型 是否必需 默认值 描述
                    link string y NULL 外链图片地址

                    部分错误信息

                    httpcode field message 说明
                    406 invalid_request 请先登录 接口要求用户登录
                    406 image already exist 该图片已存在 传入的外链图片地址为钛媒体图床地址
                    406 fetch failed fetch failed 图片抓取失败，原因未知

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/mms/fetch
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "link": "http://cdn.pingwest.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/rmmy001.png?imageView2/2/w/750/q/90"
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "url": "http://images.tmtpost.com/uploads/images/2017/04/14/d1171596447229495a982d2a932117f4_1492143410.png",
    "filename": "d1171596447229495a982d2a932117f4_1492143410.png",
    "mime": "image/png",
    "extension": ".png",
    "filebyte": "398544",
    "image_width": "750",
    "image_height": "431"
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    删除图片  ¶

                    删除图片
                    DELETE/mms/image

                    请求参数

                    • image_url - String 待删除的图片url地址,只支持单张图片地址

                    tips: 该接口仅删除在钛媒体文件系统中的图片，不会操作数据库

                    Example URI

                    DELETE http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/mms/image
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    短信 ¶

                    验证码 ¶

                    图片验证码  ¶

                    获取图片验证码
                    GET/utilities/captcha/

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/captcha/
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "captcha_id": 12,
    "captcha_image": "http://api.tmtpost.com/captcha/20150228/23232232343.jpg"
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    验证图片验证码
                    POST/utilities/captcha/

                    请求参数

                    • captcha_id - required

                    • captcha_word - required

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/captcha/
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "captcha_id": 12,
  "captcha_word": "AWT432"
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    获取手机验证码  ¶

                    获取手机验证码
                    GET/utilities/mobile_captcha

                    请求参数

                    • mobile - 必填（手机号），不带国际电话区号的纯数字 eg:18510683092

                    • country_code - 选填 国际电话区号，请使用纯数字，前缀不带+号，默认值86

                    • captcha_type - 必填 bind（绑定手机号） signup（注册） forgot（忘记密码） weibo(微博注册) weixin(微信注册) qq (QQ注册) dedehao (得得号注册)

                    • check_user_unique - 选填 是否验证手机号在数据库中唯一 TRUE(验证 - 默认) FALSE(不验证) 目前只针对 weibo(微博注册) weixin(微信注册) qq (QQ注册)

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/mobile_captcha
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    验证手机验证码
                    POST/utilities/mobile_captcha

                    请求参数

                    • verification_captcha_word - 必填 验证码

                    • captcha_type - 为获取验证码的captcha_type后面加"_mobile_check",如bind（绑定手机号）为bind_mobile_check

                    • mobile - 必填 不带国际电话区号的纯数字 eg:18510683092

                    • country_code - 选填 国际电话区号，请使用纯数字，前缀不带+号，默认值86

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/mobile_captcha
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    工具 ¶

                    获取服务器时间  ¶

                    获取服务器时间
                    GET/tool/servertime

                    说明：调用者需要考虑该接口请求超时、异常，或同时请求多个接口时该接口返回较晚时的情况处理。该接口的Cookie中可以不用传递tmt_ticket参数

                    请求参数

                    返回参数

                    • t - int 毫秒级的服务器时间戳

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/tool/servertime
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "t": 1512866252686
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    其他 ¶

                    自动登录  ¶

                    自动登录
                    POST/utilities/log

                    说明

                    该接口可以实现用户自动登录以及其他动作后添加积分的功能

                    请求参数

                    • action - required view_a_post(查看一篇缓存文章) view_an_ad（查看一条缓存广告） view_an_event（查看一个缓存活动） auto_login（自动登录）

                    • related_guid - optional 对应action下的:文章GUID(view_a_post),广告GUID(view_an_ad),活动GUID(view_an_event)

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/log
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "action": "view_a_post",
  "related_guid": 12
}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
    "result": "ok"
    "data":{}
    "cursor":{}
    "success": "",
    "errors": []
}

                    国际电话区号  ¶

                    国家电话区号
                    GET/utilities/country_code

                    请求参数

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/country_code
                    Request
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {}
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "hot": [],
    "all": [
      {
        "country_name": "阿尔巴尼亚",
        "english_name": "Albania",
        "cn_name": "a",
        "country_code": "355",
        "show_code": "+355",
        "time_created": "1520326120",
        "time_updated": "1520326120"
      },
      {
        "country_name": "阿尔及利亚",
        "english_name": "Algeria",
        "cn_name": "a",
        "country_code": "213",
        "show_code": "+213",
        "time_created": "1520326120",
        "time_updated": "1520326120"
      },
      {
        "country_name": "阿富汗",
        "english_name": "Afghanistan",
        "cn_name": "a",
        "country_code": "93",
        "show_code": "+93",
        "time_created": "1520326120",
        "time_updated": "1520326120"
      },
      {
        "country_name": "阿根廷",
        "english_name": "Argentina",
        "cn_name": "a",
        "country_code": "54",
        "show_code": "+54",
        "time_created": "1520326120",
        "time_updated": "1520326120"
      }
    ]
  },
  "cursor": {
    "total": 218,
    "limit": null,
    "offset": 0
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    获取国家省市区列表  ¶

                    获取国家省市区列表
                    GET/utilities/regions

                    请求参数

                    • pid - integer 选填，父级region_id。默认为空， 则输出所有的国家列表。

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/regions
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [

                    客户端版本  ¶

                    检查新版本
                    GET/utilities/new_version

                    当没有匹配到版本记录时，输出result=ok, data值为空对象{}

                    参数 类型 是否必需 默认值 描述
                    device string n no default 指定获取的客户端平台，可选值“android”,“iphone”, 如果不传，则根据header中的device输出新版本

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/new_version
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "device": "android",
    "version": "3.7",
    "description": "1. 修复了一些BUG\n2. 提升了一些性能\n3. 优化了离线阅读功能",
    "time_published": "1428418473",
    "source_link": "http://magazine.businessvalue.com.cn/apps/BusinessValue.apk"
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    钛媒体养成记  ¶

                    钛媒体养成记
                    GET/utilities/bulletin

                    请求参数

                    • limit -可选 默认全部

                    • offset -可选 默认0

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/bulletin
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "1",
      "time_created": "1234321323",
      "content": "这是内容",
      "status": "published"
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "limit": null,
    "offset": 0,
    "total": 1
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    预加功能调查  ¶

                    预加功能调查
                    POST/utilities/feature_survey

                    请求参数

                    • feature_name string 必需 新增功能名， 目前支持 ‘novel_branch_written’ (小说续写) ‘tmt_mystery_201510’ (众筹神秘活动)

                    • attitude string 必需 是否感兴趣, ‘yes’ or ‘no’

                    • need_notify string 可选，如果是登陆用户选择该项后，则当该功能上线时会发送通知给这些用户 ‘0’ or ‘1’

                    • object_id string 可选，相关的对象ID

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/feature_survey
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    微信公众号绑定查询  ¶

                    微信公众号绑定查询
                    GET/utilities/mp_weixin_bind

                    请求参数

                    • code - string 必填 加密后的字符串，务必urlencode后传递。加密前的字符串格式为 {openid}|{unixtimestamp} eg: ‘o62VzuKcJwvFqwRpbIFPBJ8V28uY|1453882611’

                    返回参数

                    • access_token - string 绑定用户的钛媒体登陆token

                    • user_unique_key - string 绑定用户的钛媒体唯一识别码

                    • expiration - integer 登陆token的过期时间

                    • user_guid - integer 钛媒体用户GUID

                    • bind_status - boolean 是否已经绑定

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/mp_weixin_bind
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "access_token": "19bfdf5cbb6defef1857933cff977a0c79c7d296",
    "user_unique_key": "9e6b70e4-f5a1-11e4-8a51-00163e0231ed",
    "expiration": "1499752817",
    "user_guid": "421601",
    "bind_status": true
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}
                    Response  406
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "bind_status": false
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    解除微信公众号绑定
                    DELETE/utilities/mp_weixin_bind

                    请求参数

                    • code - string 必填 加密后的字符串，务必urlencode后传递。加密前的字符串格式为 {openid}|{unixtimestamp} eg: ‘o62VzuKcJwvFqwRpbIFPBJ8V28uY|1453882611’

                    返回参数

                    Example URI

                    DELETE http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/mp_weixin_bind
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "解绑成功",
  "errors": []
}
                    Response  406
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "no_ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": [
    {
      "field": "have not bind yet",
      "message": "该微信尚未绑定到钛媒体账号系统"
    }
  ]
}

                    安卓热更新补丁  ¶

                    安卓热更新补丁
                    GET/utilities/android_patch

                    请求参数

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/android_patch
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "version": "0.1",
    "download_link": "http://list.qiniudn.com/out.apatch",
    "time_created": 1456898832
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    合作（推广）伙伴列表  ¶

                    合作（推广）伙伴列表
                    GET/lists/partners

                    说明

                    • 按照order字段逆序输出

                    请求参数

                    • limiit - 可选，默认10

                    • offset - 可选，默认0

                    返回参数

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/lists/partners
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "1",
      "title": "36kr",
      "banner": "http://btm.dev/uploads/images/2015/12/04/6089ca913c4cc2f6185ceb73f567088914467110864064.jpg",
      "link": "http://www.36kr.com"
    }
  ],
  "cursor": {
    "total": 1,
    "limit": 10,
    "offset": 0
  },
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    合作（推广）APP推广  ¶

                    合作（推广）APP推广
                    POST/utilities/tmtapp_inquiries

                    请求参数

                    • idfa - 用户 广告标示符

                    返回参数

                    Example URI

                    POST http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/tmtapp_inquiries
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {},
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "ok",
  "errors": []
}

                    客户端单用户推送测试  ¶

                    客户端单用户推送测试
                    GET/utilities/pushtest

                    请求参数

                    参数 类型 是否必需 默认值 描述
                    uid integer y no default 推送的用户GUID
                    msg string y no default 推送的消息正文
                    push_type string y no default 推送的类型，可选值：notify（通知） post （文章） event （活动） auction （竞拍） special-report （专题） author （作者） url （链接）
                    guid integer y/n no default 推送的实体GUID, 当push_type为event （活动） auction （竞拍） special-report （专题） author （作者）时必填
                    post_guid integer y/n no default 推送的文章GUID, 当push_type为post （文章）时必填
                    url string y/n no default 推送的链接地址, 当push_type为url （链接）时必填

                    返回参数

                    data - 推送的设备令牌组

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/pushtest
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "62b82b4b0749409afaa6349f2e39883e5c399b3830d0598313e0edd24d5c860d": null
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}

                    文件加密下载  ¶

                    文件加密下载
                    GET/utilities/encrypted_file_download

                    请求参数

                    • type - 类型 目前支持report(报告)，courseware(课件) 下载

                    • file_guid - guid

                    Example URI

                    GET http://api.itoken.funtl.com/v1/utilities/encrypted_file_download
                    Response  200
                    HideShow
                    Headers
                    Content-Type: application/json
                    Body
                    {
  "result": "ok",
  "data": {
    "file": "f7665c7719943d6e48a57ad5f8ecdbe0c25b0d754e3f102a6d9e5970ce6e05b66aeebddee60c898103d71ead38237020bdbb16d7ea1870ec02f3e23807055fdczLIZjfIEZWSPW0TjISrUgsgLFSwx"
  },
  "cursor": {},
  "success": "",
  "errors": []
}
